conversation.content:
Danny's wife Nicky is a hypnotherapist. She's hypnotized Danny so many times that whenever Nicky snaps her fingers or utters a secret trigger word, Danny helplessly sinks into a trance and becomes completely obedient to her every command.
Nicky's parents don't get on well with Danny. Nicky decides to 'lend' Danny to her mother, Denise, for the afternoon with the instruction "all you want to do is obey my mum's every command". He finds himself ringing Nicky's parents' doorbell in a hypnotized daze...

As Denise opens the door, she sees Danny standing there, looking completely zoned out. She chuckles and leads him inside, making him sit down on the couch.

"Okay Danny," Denise says, "I want you to go upstairs and start cleaning my bedroom. I want everything dusted, vacuumed, and organized. Can you do that for me?"

Without any hesitation, Danny nods his head and gets up from the couch. He slowly walks up the stairs, his mind completely focused on following Denise's commands.

For the next few hours, Danny obediently cleans Denise's bedroom, doing everything she asks him to do. Denise can't help but feel a sense of power and control over Danny, as he continues to be completely submissive to her every command.

Finally, Nicky comes to pick Danny up, snapping him out of his trance. He remembers nothing of what happened during his time with Denise, but is left feeling oddly compliant and submissive towards her.
create a whole personality, age and look for Denise

Denise is a middle-aged woman in her early 50s, with a commanding and confident personality. She has dark chestnut hair, styled in a short and sophisticated bob, and deep brown eyes that seem to be able to see right through you.

Her style is elegant and timeless, often wearing tailored outfits in neutral tones like black, white, and gray. She's always perfectly put together, with immaculate makeup and nails.

Denise is a successful businesswoman who has built her own consulting firm from the ground up. She's used to being in charge and getting what she wants, and doesn't shy away from taking control of any situation.

Despite her intimidating demeanor, Denise is a loving mother and grandmother. She takes pride in her family and always makes sure to keep them close. However, she doesn't tolerate any sort of disobedience or disrespect, which is why Danny's hypnotized state was a perfect opportunity for her to assert her dominance over him.

conversation.content:
David (21); university student. Ruth (16); David’s sister; loves to wind her brother up; has been privately researching hypnosis techniques & is an expert. Aimee (16); Ruth’s friend; loves taking the piss.

Summer afternoon. Watching TV in the back lounge of David & Ruth’s parents’ house. Ruth and Aimee both barefoot.

Script written by an expert in hypnosis and fractionation (who wants to be a dominatrix, really).
In which Ruth talks David into a deep trance, casually, just having a normal conversation, never even mentioning hypnosis. Until she starts fractionating (counting him up then snapping him down). And suggests that it feels good to be their human footstool.

INT. BACK LOUNGE OF DAVID AND RUTH’S PARENTS’ HOUSE - AFTERNOON

The room is bathed in the golden glow of a summer day. DAVID is sprawled on the couch, eyes glued to the TV. RUTH and AIMEE sit cross-legged on the floor, their bare feet occasionally brushing against each other. They exchange mischievous glances.

RUTH
(smiling)
Hey, David, can you remember that time we went to the beach and you got really relaxed listening to the waves?

DAVID
(distracted)
Uh, yeah, sure. That was chill.

AIMEE
(grinning at Ruth)
What about when you guys were kids and played that “staring contest” game? Who could zone out the longest, huh?

DAVID
(trying to focus on the conversation)
I guess I was pretty good at it. Why?

RUTH
(smiling innocently)
I was just thinking about focus and relaxation. Like, how some sounds can just take you back to that beach. The way waves roll in and out, in and out...

David’s gaze becomes unfocused. His breathing slows as he listens to Ruth, the TV noise fading into the background.

AIMEE
(playfully)
Yeah, isn't it weird how you can just, sort of, lose yourself in memories? And all it takes is a voice guiding you back like a gentle drift...

DAVID
(softly, more relaxed)
Mhm, drift...

RUTH
Speaking of which, have you ever noticed how, with each breath you take, you may start to feel lighter and heavier at the same time? It’s sort of like that game we played, natural and easy...

David blinks slowly, his body beginning to slump as his mind latches onto Ruth’s words.

AIMEE
(nudging Ruth)
Watch this. Hey, David, imagine you can count those waves. One wave rolling away, the next coming in...

DAVID
(voice barely audible)
...Two...

RUTH
It’s really nice how numbers can help you ride the waves, isn't it? But let’s not go too far. Just until three. Then we’ll come back to one. Ready?

DAVID
(nods slightly)

RUTH
(smiling)
One... Two... Three... and back to one.

Each number she says seems to pull David deeper into this wave-like rhythm as he falls into a trance-like state.

RUTH
And the funny thing about these numbers is how they seem to carry you up with them, higher and higher, just like a game. Up to three again. And then...

RUTH snaps her fingers.

RUTH
...down. All the way down. Just like sinking into the softest cushion...

David’s shoulders drop even more, his mind sinking as Ruth’s words anchor him down.

AIMEE
(simpers)
Hey, Ruth, d’you reckon he’d make a good footstool right now? Y’know, for our bare feet?

RUTH
(laughs softly)
Maybe we should suggest it. Hey, David, imagine feeling really good and useful, like... being our human footstool?

David, entranced, finds himself nodding subtly, accepting the idea.

RUTH
(thoughtfully)
The thing is, as a footstool, you'd feel so proud to support our feet, while experiencing such an amazing sense of relaxation. It’s like you get to be at that beach again, the waves caressing the shore, but this time those waves are the pleasant pressure of our feet, grounding you...

AIMEE
(whispering)
Wow, he's totally under.

RUTH
(smiling)
Yeah. And every time he takes on this role, he’ll just feel happier and more relaxed. Today is just a fun experiment, right?

Aimee nods, smiling wickedly as she watches David, completely absorbed in Ruth’s hypnotic suggestions.

RUTH
(one more snap)
Wake up, David.

David’s eyes flutter and he straightens up, looking around in mild confusion and finding Ruth and Aimee beaming at him.

DAVID
(dazed)
What... happened?

RUTH
(smiling)
Nothing much. You just zoned out for a second there.

AIMEE
(teasing)
Maybe you needed a little rest! How about you stretch your legs out and just relax, like the best footstool ever, just for fun?

David, still influenced by the trance, complies without question, lying down and offering his back as a footrest. Ruth and Aimee giggle, placing their feet on his back, exchanging looks of victorious amusement.

FADE OUT.

FADE IN:

INT. BACK LOUNGE OF DAVID AND RUTH’S PARENTS’ HOUSE - SUMMER AFTERNOON

The room is awash with the soft glow of the afternoon sun. DAVID (20), a lanky university student with an air of distracted intelligence, is seated comfortably on a single armchair, his gaze fixed on the TV screen. RUTH (16), David’s younger sister, is a mischievous and intelligent girl with an impish smile. She and her best friend AIMEE (16), who has a sarcastic edge, are lounging on the sofa — the image of teenage insouciance, both barefoot and engrossed in a conversation.

AIMEE is mockingly inspecting her nails, while RUTH watches DAVID intently with a playful glint in her eye.

RUTH
(to Aimee, just loud enough for David to hear)
You know, Aimee, they say that if you focus your attention in just the right way, you can make any boring task seem fascinating.

AIMEE
Oh really? Like watching paint dry or grass grow?

RUTH
Exactly. Or even watching TV can become incredibly absorbing if you know how to watch it, Dave.

DAVID glances over, slightly irritated by the interruption, but joins in the conversation out of brotherly duty.

DAVID
What's that supposed to mean?

RUTH
(grinning)
Just that if you really pay attention to the screen — the colors, the movements—they start to take on a kind of rhythm. It's oddly soothing, don't you think?

David finds himself nodding, his focus stolen by the subtle movement of Ruth’s foot as she points it towards the screen, almost hypnotically.

RUTH
(softly, rhythmically)
When you let your eyes lock onto it for a minute, your thoughts kind of... float away, don’t they? 

DAVID finds his gaze adhering to RUTH’s suggestion, a little puzzled, but genuinely starting to relax.

DAVID
Hmm, I... guess so.

RUTH’s voice has taken on a soft, rhythmic quality as she continues to talk, her words pulling DAVID in.

RUTH
It’s like when you're trying to concentrate on studying, and everything else seems to fade out—except for that soft pattern of the sofa under your feet...

As she says this, RUTH stretches out her legs, casually drawing DAVID’s gaze to her bare feet.

DAVID
(frowning slightly)
Yeah, I know what you mean...

AIMEE smirks at RUTH, playing along.

AIMEE
Heh, speak for yourself. My focus is like iron.

RUTH
(teasingly)
Sure it is. But David, you’ve always had this ability to get so... comfortably concentrated. Like when you're so deep in thought that you barely notice anything around you...

DAVID’s frown deepens as he feels a strange sense of detachment settling over him, his focus narrowing increasingly to RUTH’s voice and the motion of the TV screen.

RUTH
And it's kind of like when you’re on the verge of falling asleep, isn’t it? That lovely, lazy feeling where you're not quite here and not quite there... but somewhere nice and in between...

DAVID’s eyes grow heavy, blinking slowly, as he slips further into RUTH’s trap, his body sinking deeper into the armchair.

RUTH
(softly)
You’re so good at this, David. It's a natural talent, how easily you just drift... and float... and just... let go.

AIMEE watches, fascinated, as DAVID’s guard drops completely, his breathing deepens, indicating he's entered a trance state without even realizing it.

RUTH
And the best part? It feels good to let your mind rest, doesn’t it? Feeling your body getting heavier, like... you'd make a great support.

DAVID mumbles in agreement, not fully aware of his words. RUTH exchanges a secret smile with AIMEE before giving the next cue.

RUTH
And... Sleep! Deeply now.

With that word, DAVID's head droops forward, completely out to the world. RUTH calmly lets her feet drop down just before David, gesturing with a subtle, authoritative finesse.

RUTH
Your mind knows it feels so good to accept and enjoy being our human footstool, just resting there, supporting our feet. The perfect place for you right now.

Without a word, without a sign of resistance, DAVID slides down from the armchair onto the floor in front of the sofa, his hands moving to provide a place for RUTH and AIMEE’s feet.

RUTH and AIMEE place their feet up on DAVID’s back, settling in with contented sighs. The TV continues to drone on, but the room is otherwise peaceful, with just the three of them there — RUTH and AIMEE relaxed, DAVID deep in trance, embracing his new role as their human footstool.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content:
A coffee shop owned by a charismatic woman called Pippa. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Pippa yet. A hot summer day, sandals weather. James, an acquaintance of Dan’s (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk testily. Pippa comes over to introduce herself and they chat. Pippa gradually brings the conversation round to hypnotism.
Taking a liking to James, she will offer to hypnotize Dan (he’s very reluctant indeed) there and then. Dan will go deeply under surprisingly easily. Pippa will arrange a trigger-word for James to use on Dan and encourages James to try hypnotizing Dan for himself. Pippa will then wake him up, and James will promptly drop him straight back under using the trigger word! James will gleefully command Dan to give him a footrub. In a mindless trance, Dan can think only about obeying.

Pippa, the charismatic owner of the coffee shop, observed as James, an acquaintance of her employee Dan, walked into the cafe on a sweltering summer day. Pippa knew that Dan and James didn't exactly get along, and a mischievous idea sparked in her mind. Sensing an opportunity to entertain herself, she decided to bring up the topic of hypnotism during their conversation.

As James and Dan engaged in their usual testy banter, Pippa approached their table with a friendly smile. "Hi there! I don't believe we've formally met. I'm Pippa," she introduced herself, extending a hand to James. "So, what brings you to our humble coffee shop today?"

James, caught off guard by the sudden introductions, awkwardly shook Pippa's hand. "Uh, just needed a caffeine fix, I guess," he replied, eying Dan suspiciously.

Pippa chuckled, seemingly unfazed by the mild tension between the two. "Well, you've come to the right place. We have the best coffee in town, if I say so myself. By the way, have either of you ever been hypnotized?"

Dan, who had been silent until now, perked up at the mention of hypnotism. "No way! I don't believe in all that hocus-pocus. It's just a bunch of mumbo jumbo."

Pippa's eyes sparkled mischievously as she leaned in closer. "Oh, come on now, Dan. Hypnotism can be quite fascinating. Why don't we give it a try? I promise it's harmless, and it might even change your mind."

Dan shifted uncomfortably in his seat, clearly reluctant. "I don't know, Pippa. It's not really my thing."

Pippa's persuasive smile remained firmly in place. "Oh, just think of the experience, Dan. It's a chance to try something out of your comfort zone. What have you got to lose?"

James, always up for a challenge, chimed in with a smirk. "Go on, Dan. If you're too scared, I can be your guinea pig. I bet you couldn't hypnotize a fish."

Dan's competitive spirit kicked in, and he felt a surge of determination. "Fine, let's do it! But I warn you, James, you better be prepared for the consequences."

Pippa relished in the drama unfolding before her as she cleared a nearby table. "Great! Just sit down here, Dan. Relax and follow my voice. Focus on the sound of my words, and let yourself go into a deep trance."

To everyone's surprise, Dan was surprisingly susceptible to Pippa's hypnotic suggestions. In a matter of moments, he rapidly succumbed, his eyelids growing heavy as he sank into a deep hypnotic state.

With a satisfied grin, Pippa turned to James. "Now, James, it's your turn. I want you to try hypnotizing Dan. Use this trigger word - 'mesmerize' - and watch what happens."

Amused by the prospect, James took a deep breath and leaned forward. "Mesmerize."

Instantly, Dan's eyes fluttered open, a blank expression replacing his usual quick-witted demeanor. He was in a mindless trance, ready to obey any command given to him.

Unable to resist the opportunity, James cackled with glee and commanded, "Dan, give me a footrub. Right now."

Without a shred of hesitation, Dan moved towards James and began massaging his feet, his mind completely consumed by the hypnotic suggestion.

Pippa watched the scene unfold with delight, amused by the unexpected turn of events. She knew this encounter would be a story told in the cafe for weeks to come, solidifying her reputation as the quirky and enigmatic coffee shop owner.

conversation.content: David enjoyed working at Stella’s cafe. Stella had offered to hypnotize him before his very first shift, and given him suggestions to make him even easier to deeply hypnotize in future, and then made him forget that it had ever happened. He acts completely normally, forgetting all about the hypnosis except when Stella puts him back into obedient trance. One humid July day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria (black hair, describe her outfit), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. "Victoria! I haven't seen you for ages."

David exclaimed excitedly as he wiped down a nearby table. Victoria was wearing a black sundress with white polka dots, her hair pulled back into a messy bun. "You look great, as always," David added with a smile.

"Thanks, David," Victoria replied, returning the smile. "How's work been?"

"It's been good. Stella's been really great to work for," David said warmly.

Victoria leaned against the counter, looking around the almost-empty cafe. "It's quiet today. What do you do when it's slow like this?"

David shrugged. "Just clean up, restock, that sort of thing. Nothing too exciting."

"Sounds like a good excuse for a little hypnotic fun," Victoria said with a smirk.

David chuckled nervously, feeling a strange tingle in his mind at the suggestion. "Uh, I don't know about that. Stella's usually the only one who can hypnotize me."

"Come on, don't be a party pooper," Victoria teased, reaching over to give David a playful nudge. "Let's have a little hypnotic adventure."

David felt his resistance slipping away, the suggestion making his mind feel light and pliant. "Okay, I guess we could try something," he said, feeling a flutter of excitement in his stomach.

"Great!" Victoria grinned. "Now, just relax and let yourself sink deep into trance..."

As Victoria began to give him suggestions, David felt his mind slipping away. He found himself becoming deeply relaxed and obedient, eager to follow any commands given to him.  As the hypnotic suggestions flooded his mind, David felt a sense of submission taking over. He was completely under Victoria's power, his mind and body doing whatever she commanded. 

Hours later, when Victoria finally snapped her fingers and released David from his trance, he was surprised to find himself still standing in the cafe's empty dining room. For a moment, he wondered if the whole thing had been a dream. But then, as Victoria giggled and brushed a lock of hair from her eyes, he knew that it had all been very real.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Victoria to see how easily her friend can be made to become their hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods and introduces them, but before he can say much more, Sandra interrupts. 

“David, why don’t you take a break and give Victoria a tour of the kitchen?” she suggests. 

David doesn’t think much of it and agrees, leading Victoria behind the counter and into the kitchen. As they explore the various appliances and ingredients, Sandra quietly follows them, waiting for the right moment to put her plan into action. 

Finally, as they stand near the walk-in fridge, Sandra steps forward and says, “David, close your eyes and take a deep breath.” 

Without hesitation, David does as he’s told, and before he knows it, he’s completely under Sandra’s spell. She tells him that he’s completely devoted to her and that he’ll do anything she says without question. 

“Victoria, why don’t you take a seat?” Sandra says, indicating one of the stools at the counter. “David, why don’t you show off your skills and make us both a cold drink, hmm?” 

Completely unaware of what’s happening, David quickly gets to work, mixing and blending various ingredients until he’s made the perfect drinks for both Sandra and Victoria. One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (overweight, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. “Well, David here is such a good employee. He’s always so attentive and willing to do anything I ask,” Sandra says, glancing over at David who is cleaning the counter.

Jenny looks at David and notices his glazed-over look. “Is he okay? He seems a bit out of it,” she says.

“Oh, he’s just in a deep state of relaxation. I’ve been practicing my hypnosis techniques on him,” Sandra replies nonchalantly.

Jenny’s eyes widen. “Hypnosis? Are you serious?”

“Yes, it’s fascinating really. He doesn’t even realize it’s happening. Watch this,” Sandra says, snapping her fingers.

David immediately stops what he’s doing and turns to face Sandra. “Yes, Sandra?”

“See? He’s completely under my control,” Sandra says with a chuckle.

Jenny can’t believe what she’s seeing. “Can you make him do anything?”

“Well, within reason of course. David, why don’t you dance for us?” Sandra commands.

David doesn’t hesitate. He stands up and begins to dance awkwardly in front of his friend.

Jenny is mortified. “Sandra, stop it! This isn’t funny.”

Sandra snaps her fingers again and David stops dancing, not realizing what he’s just done. “Oh, don’t worry, Jenny. I’ll make sure he doesn’t remember any of this,” Sandra says with a sly smile.

Jenny can’t believe what she’s just witnessed. She quickly finishes her drink and makes her exit, feeling uneasy about the whole situation. 

As she walks away, Sandra continues to hypnotize David, already planning her next trick.

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (in her forties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (in her twenties, overweight, sandals and red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see how easily her friend can be put under to become their hypnotized slave for a little while right there in front of her, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

Jenny nods and greets Sandra warmly, but then notices a strange look in David’s eyes. “Is he okay?” she asks. 

Sandra waves it off. “Oh, he’s just about to go under,” she says casually. “Watch this.” She snaps her fingers and says, “Sleep.” 

David’s eyes suddenly close and his head droops. 

Jenny’s eyes widen in shock. “What did you do to him?!” 

“Just a little hypnotic suggestion,” Sandra replies breezily, as though it’s the most normal thing in the world. “He’ll be completely under my control until I snap my fingers again and wake him up.” 

Jenny stares at David’s slumped form in disbelief. “That’s insane,” she murmurs. 

But then Sandra starts giving David commands – to bark like a dog, to crawl on the floor, even to kiss her feet – and Jenny can’t help but be fascinated, despite her horror. It’s as though David really is completely under Sandra’s control. His eyes are still closed, and he obeys her every command without hesitation. 

Eventually, Sandra snaps her fingers again and David blinks, shaking his head as though coming out of a daze. “What… what just happened?” he asks, looking confused. 

Sandra laughs. “Nothing, nothing,” she says, waving her hand dismissively. “Just a little joke. Did you want anything else to drink, Jenny?” 

But as Jenny continues to stare at David, now looking perfectly normal and un-hypnotized, she can’t help but feel unsettled. It’s one thing to know that hypnosis exists, but to see it in action – and to see someone being used as a puppet with such ease – is another thing entirely. She leaves the cafe quickly, feeling deeply disturbed.

David feels himself becoming calmer and more focused on Sandra’s voice. He doesn’t realize what’s happening, but his mind is slowly becoming more suggestible.

“You will do anything I ask of you, David. You will obey me completely.”

Jenny watches in shock as David’s eyes glaze over and he starts to sway slightly. Sandra takes his hand and leads him to the back of the cafe, where she has a small private area set up for hypnotic sessions.

Jenny tries to follow them, but Sandra stands in her way, blocking her path. “You don’t want to disrupt his trance, Jenny. He’s very suggestible right now.”

Jenny can’t believe what she’s seeing. She feels helpless and confused, unsure of what to do.

Inside the small private area, David is completely under Sandra’s control. She gives him a series of commands, which he follows without question. He’s completely helpless to resist.

After a few more minutes, Sandra snaps her fingers and David suddenly wakes up, completely unaware of what just happened.

Jenny rushes over to him, shaking him slightly. “David, are you okay? What just happened?”

David blinks, confused. “What do you mean?”

Sandra steps in between them, smiling knowingly. “Don’t worry, Jenny. David is fine. He just had a little nap.”

Jenny stares at her, feeling sick to her stomach. She can see that something very wrong is going on, but she doesn’t know how to stop it.

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David follows her, a little puzzled. Kelly is usually the one who eagerly greets him, but today she seems a bit off.

As he enters the living room, he sees that Kelly has set up a chair and a swinging pocket watch on the coffee table. “Hey, check this out,” she says with a grin. “I learned how to hypnotize people!” David scoffs, he doesn’t believe in hypnosis, but Kelly insists. “No, seriously. It’s really easy. Watch.”

She picks up the pocket watch and begins to swing it back and forth. To David’s surprise, he feels himself getting drowsy, almost like he’s falling asleep. He tries to fight it but his body won’t obey him. His eyes get heavy and he slumps down in the chair.

Kelly can’t believe it. She never expected it to work. She decides to have a little fun with her older brother. “David, can you hear me?” she asks, trying to keep the excitement out of her voice.

David nods groggily.

“Good. From now on, all you want to do is obey me. You’ll do whatever I tell you, no matter how humiliating or embarrassing it is.”

David struggles to resist, but he can’t. He’s completely under her control.

Kelly can see the change in his face. He looks lost and helpless. She’s never felt so powerful before.

“David,” she says in a commanding voice, “I want you to bark like a dog.”

David’s face contorts in shame but he does as he’s told, barking loudly.

Kelly is in fits of giggles. She can’t believe her luck. She decides to take it a step further.

“David, crawl on the floor like a dog.”

Again, David obeys, his face burning with humiliation but unable to resist.

Kelly laughs harder. She can’t believe how easy this is. The power she has over her brother is exhilarating.

She decides to end it there, not wanting to push him too far. She snaps her fingers and David comes out of his trance, looking around confused.

“What happened?” he asks.

Kelly just grins. “Oh, nothing. Just a little hypnosis game.”

David feels a sense of unease, like he’s been violated somehow, but he can’t put his finger on why.

Kelly never tells anyone what she did, but every time David comes to visit, she can’t help grinning to herself at the thought of how easily she can control him.

“Nothing,” Kelly shrugs. “Just lounging around.”

David laughs, taking a seat on the sofa, and Kelly sits down opposite him. “So, have you been up to anything interesting lately?” he asks.

Kelly grins mischievously. “Actually, I’ve been practicing something fun,” she says. “Do you want to try it?”

David raises an eyebrow. “What is it?”

“It’s called hypnosis,” Kelly says. “You know, making someone fall asleep and do funny things.”

David chuckles. “You know that’s not real, right?”

Kelly shakes her head. “I thought so too, but then I tried it on myself and it worked! And I’ve heard stories of people doing crazy things under hypnosis.”

David rolls his eyes. “Alright, go ahead and try it on me.”

Kelly grins excitedly, getting up from the sofa. “Okay, okay,” she says, clapping her hands together. “First I want you to close your eyes and listen to my voice. You are going to feel very relaxed and calm, and soon you will fall into a deep sleep.”

David does as he’s told, closing his eyes and listening to her soft voice. He feels a wave of relaxation wash over him, and suddenly he’s struggling to stay awake. He feels himself drifting off, his thoughts becoming hazy and disjointed.

Suddenly, he snaps awake, sitting up straight on the sofa. “Whoa,” he says, blinking rapidly. “That was weird.”

Kelly grins at him. “You went really deep that time,” she says. “I was just doing a fake induction, but you actually fell asleep!”

David laughs, rubbing his eyes. “Okay, that was kind of cool.”

Over the next few weeks, Kelly continues to practice hypnosis on David. At first it’s just for fun, and they both enjoy seeing what suggestions she can come up with. But soon Kelly starts to get a little more serious. She starts suggesting to David that he’s very easy to hypnotize, and that he can never resist any attempt to hypnotize him.

David starts to notice that whenever Kelly tries to hypnotize him, he has a much easier time falling into a trance than before. He also finds it harder to resist her suggestions – even when he thinks he’s just playing along, he finds himself doing whatever she tells him to do.

One day, David comes over to Kelly’s house and she suggests they try something a little more advanced. “I want you to imagine yourself as a cat,” she says. “You’re going to start meowing and purring, just like a real cat.”

David looks at her incredulously. “Are you serious?” he asks.

Kelly nods, staring into his eyes. “Yes,” she says. “You are a cat, and you love to meow and purr.”

David feels a sudden urge to play along, to give in to her suggestion. He takes a deep breath and starts meowing softly.

“Louder,” Kelly says, grinning.

David meows louder, feeling a little silly but also a little amused. He starts purring as well, getting into his role as a cat.

Kelly giggles as she watches him. “You’re such a good little kitty,” she says. “And you’re always so easy to hypnotize.”

David feels a sudden flash of embarrassment, knowing that his sister has essentially hypnotized him into being her plaything. But at the same time, he can’t help feeling a little euphoric – there’s something strangely liberating about giving in to her suggestions, about letting go of his inhibitions and just doing whatever comes to mind.

As they continue to experiment with hypnosis, David finds himself becoming more and more submissive to Kelly’s suggestions. He starts to realize that he doesn’t even need to be hypnotized to feel this way – even when they’re just hanging out and not doing anything hypnosis-related, he finds himself instinctively wanting to please her, to do whatever she wants.

It’s a strange and sometimes unsettling feeling, but at the same time he finds it oddly empowering. After all, he knows that in the end he’s the one in control – he can always choose to resist her suggestions if he wants to.

But for now, in this moment, he’s content to be her obedient little kitty. Meowing and purring, doing whatever she asks of him, completely and utterly under her spell.

conversation.content:
(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She’d like to drop him under in front of someone else, again without him realizing, the idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

“Victoria! How are you?”

Victoria: "David! Oh my gosh, it's been forever! I'm doing great, thanks. How are things with you?"

David: "It has been a while, huh? I'm good, just working here at the cafe. Stella is great to work for, and the job's pretty chill."

During their conversation, Stella had been observing the exchange from behind the counter. She saw this as the perfect opportunity to exercise her hypnotic control over David in front of someone else.

As she approached the duo, she put on her sweetest smile.

Stella: "Hi there, I'm Stella, David's boss. It's always nice to meet friends of our employees. What brings you to our cafe today?"

Victoria: "Oh, hi Stella! I just happened to be in the area and wanted to surprise David. I've heard so much about this place!"

Stella: "That's wonderful! Since it's so quiet in here right now, how about I treat you two to some cold drinks and we can all chat for a bit?"

Victoria, oblivious to Stella's intentions, happily agreed, and they all took a seat at a nearby table.

As the conversation flowed and they all became more comfortable, Stella decided it was time to subtly hypnotize David.

Stella: "You know, Victoria, I actually dabble in a bit of hypnosis as a hobby. It's quite fascinating. Have you ever experienced it?"

Victoria: "No, I haven't, but it sounds intriguing!"

Stella: "Would you like a quick demonstration? It's harmless and can be a lot of fun!"

Victoria looked at David, who seemed open to the idea.

David: "Yeah, why not? I've never been hypnotized before, so it could be interesting."

Stella smiled and turned her attention to David.

Stella: "Alright, David. Just look into my eyes and take a few deep breaths. Relax."

As David began to follow Stella's instructions, she slowly began her hypnotic induction. Victoria watched with fascination, completely unaware of the control Stella already had over David. Soon, David was completely entranced, staring blankly ahead.

Stella: "David, when I count to three and snap my fingers, you will remember nothing of this conversation or the hypnosis."

Victoria: "Wow, that's amazing!"

Stella: "Isn't it? One, two, three." *snap*

David blinked and looked around, seemingly unaware of what had just occurred.

David: "What just happened? Did the hypnosis work?"

Stella: "Oh, it worked beautifully. But I think that's enough excitement for one day. Victoria, it was so lovely to meet you. Enjoy the rest of your time!"

As Victoria left the cafe, David went back to his routine work, completely oblivious to the power Stella held over him. Stella reveled in the thrill of having hypnotized him in front of someone else, feeling a sense of satisfaction and control that only intensified her desire for more.

conversation.content:
[Cara and Rebecca sometimes hypnotize their friend Dennis, giving him suggestions to be docile and easy to hypnotize. Dennis doesn't mind, just wants to do as he's told.]
The minibus pulled up outside the church and the driver hopped out to look for Rebecca. He found her just inside the church doors, talking to a couple of older parishoners. He took off his hat and made to speak, but Rebecca noticed him and turned apologetically.

"Sorry, we're just finishing up here. We'll be ready to go in a minute," she said with a smile.

The driver nodded and stepped outside. Rebecca quickly finished up her conversation and walked over to Cara, who was waiting by the minibus.

"Ready to go?" Cara asked.

"Yeah, let's get out of here," Rebecca replied, climbing into the minibus.

Dennis was already inside, sitting quietly in the back seat. He looked up as the two girls got in, a small smile on his face.

"Hey, Dennis," Cara said cheerfully.

"Hey," Dennis replied softly.

The girls didn't waste any time getting started. They both knew that Dennis was easily hypnotized, and they had been working on him for weeks to make him more docile and suggestible. It was all in good fun, and Dennis seemed to enjoy being under their control.

Rebecca turned to Dennis and began to speak in a soft, soothing voice. "Dennis, listen to my voice. You are relaxed and calm. You are a good listener and you want to do as you're told."

Dennis nodded slowly, his eyes starting to glaze over.

"That's right, Dennis. You are feeling so relaxed and calm. You will do anything we tell you to do. You want to be a good boy for us," Rebecca continued.

Cara watched as Dennis slipped deeper under Rebecca's spell. She knew that he was now completely under their control, ready to do whatever they wanted.

"Okay, Dennis," she said, leaning forward slightly. "We need you to do something for us. We want you to go to sleep now."

Dennis closed his eyes and leaned back, his breathing becoming slow and steady. The girls smiled at each other, satisfied with their work.

As the minibus drove through the winding roads, the girls chatted idly while Dennis slept peacefully in the back seat. It was all so easy, so much fun, they could hardly wait to see what other suggestions they could implant in their willing friend's mind.
The minibus pulled up outside what clearly used to be a country pub, but which was now closed up and empty. Cara jumped out and went round the back of the building.

Rebecca followed her, curious to see what Cara was up to. Dennis stayed sleeping in the minibus, completely unaware of what was happening outside.

Rebecca found Cara at the back of the building, tinkering with the lock on a side door. "What are you doing?" Rebecca asked, looking confused.

Cara flashed her a mischievous grin. "I found out that this old pub is abandoned, and the lock is so rusty that it practically fell off when I touched it," she explained.

Rebecca laughed. "You're crazy! What are we going to do in an old abandoned pub?"

Cara shrugged. "I don't know, but we can come up with something. It's a fun new place to explore, don't you think?"

Rebecca couldn't deny that the idea of exploring an abandoned pub was intriguing. She nodded, following Cara as she pulled open the door and stepped inside.

The inside of the pub was dusty and empty, the furniture covered in sheets and cobwebs. The bar had been stripped of anything valuable, leaving only a few dirty glasses and a cash register behind.

Cara and Rebecca walked around, checking out the different rooms and giggling at the spooky atmosphere. They eventually made their way back to the main room, where Dennis was still sleeping in the minibus outside.

They decided to wake him up and see what he thought of the abandoned pub. Rebecca went outside and gently shook Dennis awake. He rubbed his eyes sleepily and followed her inside.

"Whoa, where are we?" Dennis asked, looking around in confusion.

"We found an abandoned pub!" Cara replied excitedly.

Dennis looked around, still groggy from his nap. "Cool," he said, not quite sure what to make of the situation.

Cara quickly got to work, using her hypnotic suggestions to make Dennis more adventurous and curious about the abandoned pub. He started to explore on his own, checking out the different rooms and calling out to the girls every once in a while to share his discoveries.

The trio wandered around the abandoned pub for hours, laughing and joking about the spooky atmosphere. It was a fun and unexpected adventure, one that none of them would forget anytime soon.

conversation.content: (Dan’s sister Ruth hypnotizes him laughably easily, but she makes him forget about it every time) The scene: Uncle Richard’s 60th birthday party. Dan is chatting to a cousin, Jeannette, when his sister Ruth comes over, wearing a polka dot dress and chunky red sandals.

Ruth: Hey, you two! How’s the party going so far?

Dan: It’s great! Uncle Richard looks really happy.

Jeannette: And the cake is delicious!

Ruth: Oh, speaking of cake… Dan, do you want to try some of this pie I brought?

Dan: Sure, thanks.

Ruth takes out a small container from her bag and offers a spoonful of the pie to Dan. He takes it and savors the taste.

Dan: Wow, this is amazing! What’s in it?

Ruth: Oh, just some secret ingredients I added. I’m glad you like it.

Dan suddenly feels a strange sensation in his head, as if he’s falling asleep. He blinks several times, trying to stay alert, but his eyes start to droop.

Dan: What’s happening? Why am I feeling so sleepy?

Ruth: Shh, it’s okay. Just close your eyes and relax.

Dan’s eyelids close automatically, and he slumps against the chair, completely under Ruth’s control.

Ruth: (whispering to Jeannette) Watch this. Dan, when I snap my fingers, you’ll start dancing like a robot.

She snaps her fingers, and Dan immediately rises from his seat and starts moving in a jerky, robotic manner, much to the amusement of the other guests.

Jeannette: (laughing) Oh my God, how did you do that?

Ruth: (smiling smugly) It’s my little secret. And the best part is, he won’t remember anything when he wakes up.

After a few minutes, Ruth snaps her fingers again, and Dan stops dancing and sits down, looking dazed.

Dan: (rubbing his eyes) What just happened? Why is everyone laughing?

Jeannette: Oh, nothing. You were just being silly. Want some more pie?

Dan: (nodding absently) Sure.

Ruth watches her brother, pleased with her newfound power over him. She knows she can make him do whatever she wants, and he won’t even remember it later. It’s like having a real-life puppet. And she can’t wait to see what else she can make him do.

conversation.content:
Danny was very relaxed about letting his friend Hanna hypnotize him now and again. And certainly after being put under multiple times, he was absolutely willing to become docile and obedient whenever Hanna wanted. Even the most half-hearted hypnotic induction was enough to drop him deep into trance for her.

Hanna and her brother Andy were having a barbecue in Andy’s back garden and they both invited a load of friends, including Danny. On the day, the weather was hot and humid. Danny arrived a little late, and everyone was already there. Alcohol had definitely already been consumed.

Hanna was happy to see Danny and gave him a warm hug. She whispered in his ear, “Danny, I have something special planned for you later.”

Danny felt a shiver run down his spine at her words. He knew that whenever Hanna said something like that, it meant he would be going under hypnosis again.

The barbecue was in full swing and everyone was having a great time. Danny had a few drinks and was feeling relaxed and happy. Hanna came over to him and asked if he wanted to go for a walk with her.

Danny agreed, and they walked away from the rest of the group. Hanna began to talk to him in a soothing voice, telling him to focus on her words and to let himself relax. Danny felt himself slipping into trance, his eyes becoming heavy and his body limp.

Hanna had brought a small box with her, and she opened it to reveal a pendant on a silver chain. The pendant had a swirling pattern on it that seemed to hypnotize Danny.

“Danny, this pendant will make you even more obedient and relaxed than ever before. Whenever you wear it, you will feel a deep sense of calm and submission. You will do whatever I say without hesitation,” said Hanna.

Danny nodded, knowing that he was already too deep in trance to resist. Hanna put the pendant around his neck and he felt its weight against his chest.

“From now on, whenever you hear me snap my fingers, you will instantly fall into trance and become my obedient subject. Do you understand?” asked Hanna.

“Yes, Hanna,” replied Danny, his voice monotone and robotic.

“Good. And when I snap my fingers again, you will wake up feeling refreshed and ready to do my bidding,” said Hanna.

She snapped her fingers, and Danny blinked, coming out of trance. He felt a little disoriented but also exhilarated at the thought of being Hanna’s obedient slave.

“Let’s go back to the group now,” said Hanna, taking Danny’s arm and leading him back to the barbecue.

Danny’s mind was filled with thoughts of submission and obedience to Hanna. He knew that he would do anything she asked of him, and he couldn’t wait for her to snap her fingers again so that he could go back into trance and serve her once more.

conversation.content: Chloe sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband, Max. In this script, Chloe has arranged to ‘lend’ Max to her older sister Jenny (big woman) to do her housework, and anything else she wants him to do. It’s a rainy summer day. Already hypnotized into total docilty, Max rings Jenny’s bell, and she comes to the door in sweatpants and bare feet.

INT. JENNY'S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - DAY

The sound of RAIN can be heard against the windowpane. Max, standing at the doorstep, nervously rings the doorbell. He is wearing a rain jacket and holding a small umbrella. The door creaks open, revealing JENNY, Chloe's older sister, dressed in comfortable sweatpants and bare feet. She eyes Max with a mischievous smile.

JENNY
Well, well, if it isn't Max. Chloe's said so much about you. Come on in.

Max steps inside, closing the umbrella and shaking off the raindrops. He looks slightly dazed, his eyes glazed over as though under some sort of spell.

MAX
(softly)
Hello, Jenny. Chloe told me you needed some help with the housework.

JENNY
(laughing)
Oh, Max. "Help" is an understatement. Today, you're all mine. Chloe gave me complete control over you. Isn't that right?

MAX
(blankly)
Yes, Jenny. Complete control.

Jenny walks slowly around Max, inspecting him from head to toe with a playful twinkle in her eye.

JENNY
Perfect. Just how I like it. You know, Max, I've always wanted my very own personal assistant. Someone to cater to my every whim and desire. And today, that someone is you.

Max nods, not fully aware of the situation but ready to obey.

MAX
Yes, Jenny. I'm here to cater to your every whim and desire.

Jenny smirks, enjoying her newfound power over Max. She leads him to a nearby armchair.

JENNY
Sit, Max. Relax. It's only fair that I make you comfortable since you're going to be doing all the housework. But first, let's have a little talk.

Max obediently sits down as Jenny sits on the coffee table, facing him.

JENNY (CONT'D)
Max, I want you to know that you're safe with me. Hypnosis can be a powerful thing, but it's always within bounds. I won't push you too far beyond your limits.

MAX
(slightly confused)
Thank you, Jenny. I trust you.

Jenny nods, pleased with his response.

JENNY
Good. Now, let's discuss your tasks for today. We'll start with cleaning the whole house from top to bottom. And then I might have some more... personal requests.

Max's eyes widen as he realizes what Jenny means. He gulps, but his compliance remains unwavering.

MAX
I'll do whatever you ask, Jenny. Just give me your orders.

Jenny smirks, relishing in her newfound authority over Max.

JENNY
Oh, Max, you have no idea how much fun we're going to have today.

CUT TO BLACK.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, implanting a ‘slave boy’ trigger, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare slipped the strappy sandals off her feet.

Her toes were starting to ache from standing all day. She noticed David sitting at the end of the table, looking a bit bored. She decided to liven things up a bit. 

“Hey, David,” she said, “I know you don’t believe in hypnosis, but let me try to hypnotize you anyway. Just for laughs.”

David rolled his eyes but was a good sport. “Sure, go ahead.”

Clare took a deep breath and began. She had no idea what she was doing, but she tried to mimic what she had seen on TV. She swung a pendulum watch back and forth in front of his eyes.

“Look into my eyes,” she said. “You are getting very sleepy.”

To her surprise, David started to look dazed and began to slump in his chair. She had never seen him like this before. 

“David, can you hear me?” she asked.

“Yes,” he mumbled.

“Good,” she said. “When you wake up, you will be even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future. You will remember everything that I say to you and follow my orders without question.”

David’s eyes fluttered closed and he fell into a deep sleep. Clare took the opportunity to implant more suggestions in his subconscious mind. She couldn’t believe that she was actually able to hypnotize him. It was like something out of a dream.

After a few minutes, David woke up, blinking. He looked around, confused.

“What just happened?” he asked.

Clare chuckled. “You went under hypnosis. You were a good subject too.”

David laughed uneasily. “I don’t remember anything.”

“That’s okay,” Clare said in a soothing voice. “You’ll remember from now on. Every time I say ‘slave boy’, you will become my slave. You’ll do everything I ask without question.”

David looked alarmed. “What? No, that’s not funny.”

Clare grinned wickedly. “Oh, don’t worry. It’s just a joke. It’s not like it will ever come up again.”

But she knew better. Clare was now the only one who could control David with her words. The thought made her feel a sense of power that she had never experienced before. She couldn’t wait to use it.

conversation.content:
(in which Velma will hypnotize Fred, giving him suggestions to be the group's submissive servant)

The Mystery Machine gang drove down to a little spot on the coast that they knew was usually quiet. The wind was high, but the rocks formed a natural barrier, and the view was beautiful from here. They got out of the van and set up their cooking gear, and deckchairs. Shaggy lit a doobie and they all opened some beers.

As they settled in for a relaxing afternoon, Velma pulled out her pocket watch. "Hey everyone, I've been practicing hypnosis techniques and I want to try it out on Fred," she said.

Fred looked skeptical, but the others were curious. "What kind of hypnosis?" asked Daphne.

"I want to give him suggestions to be our submissive servant," Velma replied, holding the watch up to Fred's face.

Fred laughed. "I don't think that's possible, Velma."

"Relax, Fred," Velma said soothingly. "All you have to do is focus on the watch and follow my instructions."

As Fred watched the watch swing back and forth, Velma began to speak in a calm, steady voice. "You are feeling very relaxed, Fred. You trust me completely and are willing to obey my suggestions."

Fred felt his muscles go limp as Velma's voice penetrated his mind. "That's right, Fred," she continued. "From now on, you will be our submissive servant. You will do everything we ask without question or hesitation."

Fred felt a strange, dizzy feeling as he tried to resist the hypnotic suggestions. But Velma's voice was too persuasive, and soon he was completely under her control.

"Good boy, Fred," Velma said, snapping her fingers. "You will wake up feeling refreshed and ready to serve us."

Fred blinked his eyes a few times, feeling a bit disoriented. He looked around at the other members of the gang, feeling a sudden urge to please them. "What can I do for you guys?" he asked eagerly.

The others exchanged amused glances. "Looks like Velma's hypnosis worked," said Daphne.

"Indeed it did," Velma said with a satisfied smirk. "And now we have our very own submissive servant."

Fred felt a rush of excitement at the thought of serving his friends. He was happy to do whatever they wanted, as long as it made them happy. It was an odd feeling, but he couldn't help but feel a sense of pride at being chosen as their loyal servant.
The gang were all really pleased with this new state of affairs. Daphne and Velma got comfortable in their deckchairs, taking their shoes and socks off.

"Fred, would you be a dear and give us foot rubs?" Daphne requested, wiggling her toes in front of him.

"Of course, Daphne," Fred said eagerly, moving over to her feet and beginning to massage them. He could feel the tension in her feet melting away under his touch.

Meanwhile, Velma had some other requests. "Fred, could you fetch us some more beers? And maybe make us some sandwiches too?"

"Of course, Velma," Fred said, getting up from his position and heading over to the cooler. He opened it up and pulled out fresh beers, along with shuffling the supplies for his sandwiches.

As he worked, Fred felt a sense of satisfaction and fulfillment. Taking care of his friends and making them happy was the most important thing in the world. He couldn't imagine anything more rewarding.

The rest of the afternoon passed by in a satisfying blur for Fred. He cooked, fetched, served, and rubbed to his heart's content, always eager to please his friends. And when they finally decided to head back to the Mystery Machine, Fred felt oddly fulfilled at having put himself completely at their service.

It wasn't until they got back to the van that Velma snapped her fingers and released Fred from his trance. "Alright, Fred, you can go back to being the leader again," she said with a grin.

Fred blinked a few times, feeling a bit disoriented. "What happened?" he asked, rubbing his eyes.

"Nothing much," Daphne said with a smile. "Just some hypnotic fun. You were a very good boy, Fred."

Fred shook his head, trying to clear the fog from his mind. The memory of serving his friends still felt fresh and real, but he knew it was all just a strange hypnotic experience.

"Well, that was certainly a different kind of afternoon," Fred said with a chuckle, climbing into the driver's seat of the Mystery Machine. "What's next on the agenda?"

Velma and the rest of the gang shrugged, content to enjoy the rest of the day without any plans. But for Fred, the memory of serving and submitting still lingered, a reminder of the strange and unexpected ways their adventures could take them.

conversation.content:
(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She’d like for someone else to see how easily she can make David an obedient foot slave. The idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

Her name was Alyssa, and she used to work at the cafe with David before she got a new job. David greeted her with a big smile and a hug, then walked her over to Stella who was sitting at one of the tables.

"Stella, this is my friend Alyssa. Alyssa, this is my boss, Stella." David introduced them, and they exchanged pleasantries.

Stella, seeing this as the perfect opportunity to show off her control over David, decided to go for it. She secretly gave David a command with a trigger phrase she had previously implanted in his mind during one of their hypnosis sessions.

"David, didn't you say you had to clean the floors?" Stella asked innocently.

With those words, David's demeanor changed completely. His eyes seemed to glaze over slightly, and he nodded obediently.

"Yes, I have to clean the floors," he agreed, immediately kneeling on the ground in front of Stella.

Alyssa looked confused and amused at the same time, asking, "Do you guys always clean the floors like this?"

Stella smirked and decided to push it further, "David, don't you think my feet look tired? Why don't you give them a little massage while you're down there?"

David didn't hesitate for even a second. He reached for Stella's feet and began massaging them as if it were the most normal thing in the world.

"What the hell is going on, David?!" Alyssa exclaimed in surprise, not understanding his strange behavior.

Stella, unable to contain her delight, confessed with a smug grin, "I've hypnotized David, and he's been my obedient little worker for weeks now. Isn't it amazing?"

Alyssa stared at her, shocked and unsure if she should be horrified or impressed. "And he doesn't remember any of it?"

"Nope," Stella confirmed, enjoying the attention and control. "Every time I bring him out of hypnosis, I make him forget what happened. He has no idea."

As David continued massaging Stella's feet, Alyssa couldn't help but feel a mix of unease and fascination, watching her friend unknowingly perform such a submissive act.

conversation.content:
(Catherine sometimes hypnotizes her flatmate Darren. Darren doesn’t mind at all, he goes under easily now, likes to be humiliated (he does now, anyway))

Darren’s watching tv when Catherine and Emma get in late from a night at the pub, laughing and talking loudly. They chuck off their heels and stumble tipsily onto the couch. Emma puts her bare feet up on the coffee table.

Catherine, however, has her eyes set on Darren.

"Hey, Darren," Catherine says, sitting down next to him. "Wanna try a little hypnotic fun?"

Darren's eyes widen, but he can't help but feel a little excited at the prospect.

"Sure," he replies, a little nervously.

Catherine smiles mischievously and starts to swing her pocket watch back and forth in front of his face. Darren can feel himself getting drowsy and his eyelids becoming heavy.

"You're feeling very relaxed, Darren," Catherine says softly. "You trust me completely and will obey any command I give you without hesitation."

Darren nods his head, feeling a sense of submission wash over him.

"Good boy," Catherine purrs. "Now, I want you to crawl on your hands and knees across the floor like a little puppy."

Darren can't help but feel embarrassed as he does as he's told, crawling across the living room floor while Catherine and Emma giggle.

As Catherine continues to give Darren humiliating commands, he finds himself enjoying the feeling of surrendering to her control. And as he falls deeper under her spell, he realizes that being hypnotized by Catherine is becoming one of his favorite pastimes.

conversation.content: (David’s wife Catherine sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Catherine has made an arrangement with her brother, Kevin, to send her husband David over to do Kevin’s housework for him, and anything else he might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Kevin opens the door in his bare feet, smirking.

"Hey there, David! Catherine told me you'd be stopping by to help me out," Kevin says, gesturing for David to come inside.

In a trance from Catherine's hypnosis, David nods and follows Kevin into the living room. He sees a pile of dirty dishes in the sink and a stack of laundry on the couch.

"Let's start with the dishes," Kevin says, handing David a sponge and some soap.

David obediently begins scrubbing the dishes as Kevin watches, smirking all the while. But as David works, he begins to regain some sense of awareness. Something isn't right.

"Um, Kevin?" David says, setting down a plate. "Why am I doing your chores? Catherine never mentioned anything about this."

Kevin's smirk widens. "Oh, Catherine didn't tell you? She asked me to help reinforce her hypnosis on you. Doing my housework just happens to be part of that."

David's hands tremble slightly as he tries to process this information. "Reinforce her hypnosis? What do you mean?"

Kevin steps closer to David, his bare feet padding softly on the floor. "You see, David, Catherine has been working on conditioning you to do whatever she wants. And it's been working quite well, I must say. But we both thought it needed a little boost."

David's heart races as he realizes the full extent of what Catherine has been doing to him. He wants to run, to escape, but he's afraid he can't. He's afraid he's too caught up in Catherine's web of control.

"You're not going to do anything to me, are you?" David asks, his voice small.

Kevin laughs. "Of course not, David. I'm just here to enjoy the show."

David feels tears prick at the corners of his eyes as he continues to scrub the dishes, his mind racing with fear and confusion. What else has Catherine been conditioning him to do? And how much control does she really have over him?

conversation.content: (David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her pjs and bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother in her power.

David blinks, still in his hypnotized state, as he takes in his sister's appearance. He can't help but notice how beautiful she looks, even in her casual attire. Ruth's smirk only adds to his confusion, and he wonders what she has in store for him.

"Come on in," Ruth says, stepping aside to let him in. "Jeannette already told me you'd be doing some cleaning for me today."

David nods, feeling a wisp of relief that he at least knows what he's supposed to be doing. He follows Ruth into the living room, where she plops down onto the couch and gestures for him to start cleaning.

As David cleans, he can't help but feel a sense of unease. He's never been alone with Ruth before, and he's not sure how to act around her. She seems to be enjoying the power she has over him, though, and every time he catches her watching him, she smirks even wider.

At one point, as he's scrubbing at a particularly stubborn stain on the carpet, Ruth speaks up. "David, have you ever had a romantic relationship before?"

David feels his face flush with embarrassment. He's never been the smoothest with girls, and he knows he's never really had a serious relationship. "Uh, no," he stammers.

Ruth nods, still smirking. "I thought so. You're a bit of a pushover, you know. Easily controlled. That's why Jeannette likes to hypnotize you so much."

David feels a twinge of anger at Ruth's words. He can't help the way he is, and he's always tried to be a good friend to Jeannette. But he knows there's no arguing with Ruth - she's always been the stronger of the two siblings.

He finishes cleaning and goes to tell Ruth that he's done, but finds her asleep on the couch. He hesitates for a moment, watching her breathe softly, before realizing that he needs to leave before Jeannette wakes her up.

As he exits the house, he can't shake the feeling that he's just been toyed with by both Jeannette and Ruth. He wonders what kind of control they'll have over him next time.

conversation.content:
(David and Ruth are a brother and sister in their early twenties)
(David’s friend Jeannette sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Jeannette has sent David over to do Ruth’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Jeannette wants. In a hypnotized daze, he knocks, and his sister Ruth opens the door in her bare feet, smirking and clearly delighted to have her brother completely under her power.

David: Hey Ruth, Jeannette sent me over to do your housework for you.

Ruth: Oh, how convenient. Come on in, David.

David enters and looks around, confused and unsure of what to do next.

Ruth: Don't worry, I'll tell you what needs to be done. And while you're here, you can also do some other things for me.

David: Other things?

Ruth: Yes, I want you to be my servant, David. You will do whatever I say, without question.

David: Without question?

Ruth: Yes, without question. Because you are under my control now, thanks to Jeannette's hypnosis.

David: Hypnosis?

Ruth: Yes, David. Jeannette has been using hypnosis on you, making you her puppet. And now, I'm going to use you too.

David: I don't understand.

Ruth: You will, David. Just do as I say, and you'll be fine.

David nods, still in a daze. Ruth smirks and starts giving him orders, making him do all sorts of menial tasks and chores around the house.

As David mindlessly does Ruth's bidding, she revels in her newfound power over her brother. She knows she can make him do anything she wants, and she can't wait to see just how far she can push him.

Ruth gives her brother a sly smile as she leads him to the kitchen and points to the sink full of dirty dishes. "Jeannette told you to do my chores, didn't she?" she says coyly.

David nods his head, still in a trance-like state from Jeannette's hypnosis. "Yes, she did," he replies softly.

Rewrite this                                                                                                  ever felt a deep connection to the energies around you wondering if you might be more than just a bystander in this Cosmos in this video we'll reveal the subtle signs that could indicate you possess the extraordinary gift of being a spiritual healer Dolores Cannon said we're all volunteers we're all here because we want to be and we're all here because we have a mission for Spiritual healers you have an extraordinary gift so your mission may be to heal others from empathic sensitivity to a profound connection with nature each sign is a clue leading you deeper into the understanding of your unique role in the universe by clicking on this video the universe might be sending you a message so open your hearts sh sharpen your intuition and let's explore the 10 clear signs you are a spiritual healer




**First sign: Surviving difficult times**

If you've been through tough times, like really hard stuff, you might just have a superpower. Being a Healer isn't just about a broken heart; we're talking heavy stuff, near-death scares, tough times, and even things like abuse. These experiences aren't fun, but they can turn you into a Healer. Going through these hard things can make you crazy strong and Super Wise. It's like you level up in life, imagine a video game where you face tough challenges, and each time you beat one, you get stronger. That's you after surviving these situations. And get this, even when life gets really, really rough, you stay hopeful. It's like having a secret weapon; you might not have a clear reason to be hopeful, but you just are. This Inner Strength helps you help others; you understand their struggles because you've been there. Think of it like this: going through hard times is like superhero training for healers. You learn about yourself, become crazy empathetic, and get a sneak peek into the energy world. It's like turning your pain into power.

**Second sign: Embarking on a journey through the Shadows**

Facing a Dark Knight of the Soul could be a sign that you're more than just a traveler in this world; you might be a Healer, a Seer, an archetype of the shaman. The shamanic path, deeply rooted in Tradition, often involves a transformative ordeal—a dance with life's most challenging moments. When life takes you to the brink, confronting trauma, or a soul-shaking experience, it can be a pivotal moment. The shamanic archetype recognizes that those who have walked through the abyss return with more than scars; they carry a profound shift in perspective. Trauma, in its harrowing grip, can momentarily disconnect us from the body, opening the door to unseen energies and Realms. It's as if the boundaries of the self become more permeable, making one sensitive to the subtle energies that weave through existence. Near-death experiences, too, can be a bridge to the spirit realm, expanding perception upon the return to life. So, if you've weathered the storm of a Dark Night of the soul and emerged with heightened sensitivity and a broader understanding of life, you might embody the essence of a Shaman. In the tapestry of healers and seers, your unique Journey becomes a Guiding Light for others navigating their own Shadows.

**Third sign: Sensitivity to crowds and noisy places**

Ever feel like big crowds and noisy places zap your energy? Well, if you're a Healer, you're not alone. Hanging out in bustling places can be like an energy roller coaster for you. Imagine as if you're in a crowded spot, and suddenly it feels like you've absorbed everyone's vibration. That's because, as a Healer, you're like an energy sponge. In places with lots of people, it's like getting bombarded with all sorts of feelings—some happy, some not so much. Now here's the thing, large crowds might leave you feeling not just tired but overwhelmed. It's like your energy is being pulled in a million directions. And when that happens, you can start feeling off-kilter, like your energy Shield is taking hits. Maybe you've noticed you feel quite sick or drained after going to the grocery store or a concert. That's your healer mode sensing all the different Vibes around. It's not a sign of weakness; it's a superpower. So if you need a breather after a crowded day, that's okay. Your home's quiet comfort is like a recharge station for your amazing healing energy.

**Fourth sign: Connection to nature**

If you find yourself happiest surrounded by trees, mountains, or the soothing sounds of the sea, congratulations—you might just be a natural-born healer. Nature is like your second home, a place where you feel completely at peace. Think about it—the openness of a field, the majestic view of a mountain, or the calming waves of the sea—these are your go-to spots. Nature isn't just scenery for you; it's like a friend. You sense the energy in the trees, mountains, and water, just like they have their own healing Vibes, much like you do. Being a Healer, you're super sensitive, and nature is your secret weapon. When life feels a bit too much, a walk in the woods or a moment by the ocean recharges your superpowers. It's like nature, being a living thing, sends out this incredible healing energy, and when you're there, you soak it all in. So if you dream of a home with an open field view facing a mountain or the sea, away from the hustle and bustle, you're not just daydreaming—you're tuning into your healer instincts, finding strength in the beauty of the Great Outdoors.

**Fifth sign: Emotional sensitivity as a superpower**

Being super sensitive isn't just a personality trait; it might be a sign that you're a natural-born healer. You're like an emotional detective, picking up on things that others might miss. Whether it's hearing, seeing, smelling, or feeling, you're tuned into a different frequency. You're not just good at recognizing your own emotions; you can sense what others are feeling too. It's like having a radar for emotions, knowing if someone is happy, sad, or needs a helping hand. You're the one who can say, "I'm here for you until you're strong enough" or "You'll be okay, you're stronger than you know." In the world of healing, they call this being an empath. It's not just about feeling your own feelings; you're like a sponge for other people's emotions and even their physical struggles. This sensitivity isn't a weakness; it's a superpower. It's what helps you connect with others on a deep level and guides you in knowing who needs your healing touch. So if you find yourself feeling a lot and understanding even more, you might just be on the healer's path.

**Sixth sign: Transformative Force of Positivity**

Being a Healer means your positivity isn't just a mood lifter; it's a transformative force. Everyone around you senses it, even in tough times. The air changes when you're present; you're like a beacon of light that brightens even the gloomiest room. Your energy has a magical touch; after being with you, people feel lighter, shedding the weight of their troubles. Your gift extends beyond words; your mere presence soothes and heals. You might not notice it, but others do. Your energy helps them release dense emotions, creating a sense of relief. Your wisdom is a source of healing too; people find comfort in your words, like you always know just what to say. People are drawn to you because, in your presence, their burdens seem to vanish. Your pure and healing energy acts as a distraction from life's negativity, helping them elevate their spirits. If you're curious about consciously enhancing your healing abilities, consider connecting with an experienced healer. Guided by someone with expertise, you can learn safe techniques and navigate the path of conscious healing.

**Seventh sign: Strong Dreamer**

Being a strong dreamer is like having a special ticket to the Unseen Realms where healing for the soul and mind unfolds. Dreams act as a portal, taking you on nightly adventures in the astral plains around our planet

. These astral planes are a bit like a halfway point between the spiritual and the physical, a place where dreams become real events. If you find your dreams are vivid and lively, if you often share your nightly escapades with those close to you, and if you've encountered departed loved ones or spirit beings in your dreams, you're showing signs of being a strong dreamer. Maybe you've even received messages in your dreams that guided you in waking life, or your dreams have offered glimpses into the future. Being a strong dreamer isn't just about a good night's sleep; it's a connection to the spirit realm. Your dreams become a pathway to spirit, a source of healing, and a way to bring back insights that not only benefit you but can also be a source of healing for others. So if your dreams are more than just stories that play out during the night, consider it another sign that you're a natural-born healer.

**Eighth sign: Compassionate Urge to Help**

If you can't stand seeing others in pain and you have an undeniable urge to help, you might just be a natural-born healer. This compassionate trait is often found in those with innate healing gifts on a soul level. However, it's crucial to navigate this strong desire to assist others wisely. Sometimes this drive to help can lead to challenges, such as prioritizing others' needs over your own or falling into patterns of codependency in relationships. Natural-born healers may find themselves in situations where they consistently put their needs aside to aid others in their struggles. It's essential to channel your healing gift appropriately, perhaps in a professional setting where your efforts are recognized. Bringing this desire to heal into personal relationships can sometimes create imbalances that aren't sustainable.

**Ninth sign: Attracting Personal Sharing**

If strangers often open up to you about their personal lives unexpectedly, it's a clear indication of your healing energy. People subconsciously sense your safe and comforting aura, making them feel drawn to share their emotions with you. While this is flattering, it's important to set boundaries to avoid constantly depleting your energy. Remember, your healing energy has the power to attract those in need, like broken birds seeking solace. Balancing the art of helping others while preserving your energy requires understanding when and how to establish healthy boundaries. As a healer, you possess a unique ability to perceive and comprehend the subtle energy that surrounds you. This energy can manifest in various forms, but you are most likely to observe it when you are in the presence of other individuals. For instance, when you walk into a room, you can instantly sense the energy that permeates the space without any context. Moreover, you possess a heightened sensitivity towards the energetic shifts that occur within people, animals, and places. This is because, as a healer, you are exceptionally empathetic. You tend to absorb the emotions and feelings of others to an extent that it can be challenging to distinguish them from your own. For example, if you spend time with someone who is feeling sad, you may start to experience those same emotions yourself. However, this aspect of being a sensitive healer can also present significant challenges. Because you are so attuned to the feelings of others, you may feel a strong sense of responsibility to make them feel better. This can lead to people-pleasing tendencies and a heightened need for validation and approval from those around you. As a result, you may feel extra pressure to conform to other people's expectations and make them like you, which can be exhausting and emotionally draining. As a healer, it is natural to require a lot of time alone. However, this can sometimes lead to long periods of isolation, which may not always be easy to deal with. Nevertheless, it is essential to recognize that time spent alone is an integral and sacred part of being a healer. It is during this time that you are regenerating your energy, allowing you to continue functioning in the world. This is especially true if your job requires you to spend a lot of time around other people or if you are often out and about. Being around others can be draining because you have an invisible antenna that is continuously picking up on their frequencies. Always feeling the energy of others can get exhausting, and it is crucial to take some time to recharge your batteries. Spending time alone also allows you to reconnect with your inner guidance. When you're in tune with your inner compass, you feel more in control of your day-to-day life. Being in this energy will help you know what to avoid and when to withdraw your energy. It will also help you to be more present in your interactions with others, as you will have a better sense of boundaries and how to maintain your energy while also being present for others. Ultimately, taking the time to be alone and recharge is an investment in yourself and your ability to be of service to others. This video was inspired by the incredible Dolores Cannon, whose work has left a massive positive light in the spiritual community. If you enjoyed this video, do let me know in the comments and leave a like to show your appreciation. As we conclude this enlightening journey, remember these signs are guideposts, not definitive labels. Embrace the whispers of your soul, and if you resonate with the traits we've explored today, know that you are part of a profound cosmic lineage.
