conversation.content:
(David’s sister Kelly embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him just want to obey her like a zombie, and become even easier to hypnotize in future, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee)

David and Kelly are hanging out in the garden of their parents’ house, having come over for a Sunday visit. It’s a warm day, and Kelly has taken her socks off and is lying back on a blanket. David is drinking a beer and watching the clouds.

“Hey, David,” Kelly says, sitting up suddenly. “Check out this cool thing I saw online. It’s called hypnosis.”

David rolls his eyes. “Oh, come on, Kelly. You don’t seriously believe in that stuff, do you?”

“Of course not,” Kelly says, grinning. “But it’ll be fun to pretend, right? I mean, who knows, maybe it actually works.”

David shrugs. “Fine, whatever. Go ahead and try to hypnotize me. I dare you.”

Kelly smirks. “Challenge accepted.”

She sits up and puts her hands on David’s shoulders, looking straight into his eyes. “Okay, David. Look into my eyes. Focus on my voice. Just listen to the sound of my voice, and let all thoughts disappear from your mind.”

David feels a little silly, but he plays along, staring at Kelly’s eyes as she speaks. To his surprise, he starts to feel a strange sensation in his head, like a gentle pressure building up.

“Now, David, you’re feeling very relaxed. Your body is heavy, your mind is empty. You’re just floating in a sea of calm.”

David blinks and shakes his head. “Whoa, Kelly. I actually feel kind of weird.”

“Shh,” Kelly says softly. “Just let it happen. Let yourself go deeper. Let my voice guide you.”

David feels like he’s in a dream. He can hear Kelly’s voice, but it’s like she’s talking to him from far away. His body feels heavy and tingly at the same time.

“Now, David, I want you to repeat after me. I am under your hypnosis, Kelly.”

David feels a moment of resistance, but for some reason, he can’t quite bring himself to refuse. He swallows hard and repeats the words, feeling like he’s disconnected from himself.

Kelly’s grin widens. “Good, David. Very good. You’re doing exactly what I say. And it feels so easy, doesn’t it? It’s like you don’t even want to resist me.”

David blinks and shakes his head again, feeling like he’s coming out of a fog. “What’s going on, Kelly? Did you really hypnotize me?”

Kelly laughs. “Yes, David! You really went under! Isn’t it cool?”

David feels a mixture of embarrassment and confusion. He can’t believe he actually fell for Kelly’s silly game.

“But don’t worry, David,” Kelly says, still grinning. “I’m not going to make you do anything embarrassing. I just want to give you a few suggestions, okay? Suggestions that will make you even more suggestible in the future.”

David frowns. “What kind of suggestions?”

“Just simple ones,” Kelly says. “Like every time you hear me snap my fingers, you’ll instantly feel calm and relaxed. You won’t be able to resist doing whatever I ask you to do, even if it’s something you wouldn’t normally do.”

David blinks, feeling like he’s waking up from a strange dream. “Wait, Kelly, are you serious? I don’t want to be like some mindless zombie every time I’m around you.”

Kelly sighs dramatically. “Oh, come on, David. It’s just for fun. And besides, it’s not like you’ll even remember any of this.”

David feels a sudden pang of unease. He’s not sure he likes the idea of Kelly having that much power over him, even if it is just pretend.

But before he can say anything else, Kelly snaps her fingers in front of his face. Instantly, David feels a wave of relaxation wash over him, and he forgets all about his resistance.

“Good boy, David,” Kelly says, patting his head playfully. “You’re such a good boy for me.”

David feels a sudden moment of panic, but before he can say or do anything, Kelly snaps her fingers again and he’s floating back down into the hypnotic trance, obedient and suggestible.

David chuckles. “Yeah, right. That stuff isn’t real.”

Kelly sits up, giving him a sly smile. “Oh really? I bet I could make you believe it.”

David raises an eyebrow. “You want to try and hypnotize me?”

“Why not? It’s worth a shot.”

Kelly sits up and stretches, placing her hands on Dave’s shoulders. “Alright, listen to my voice and just let yourself relax…”

She begins to speak in a soothing tone, her voice becoming slower and lower as she suggests that he’s feeling more and more relaxed, that every breath he takes is making him feel more and more at ease. David rolls his eyes and tries not to laugh, but soon his eyelids start to droop and his body feels heavy.

Kelly grins in amazement. She had only intended to tease David, but somehow she’s actually hypnotizing him.

“Now,” she says, more commandingly, “I want you to repeat after me. I am feeling very relaxed.”

“I am feeling very relaxed,” David says obediently.

“My mind is open to suggestion.”

“My mind is open to suggestion.”

“From now on, every time I snap my fingers, you will become more and more deeply hypnotized.”

“From now on, every time you…”

And just like that, Kelly snaps her fingers and David’s eyes glaze over. He sways a little and sits down heavily on the grass.

Kelly bites her lip in excitement. This is incredible. She’s hypnotized David, and he’s unbelievably suggestible.

“David, stand up,” she commands.

Without hesitation, David rises to his feet.

“Now, I want you to do a little dance for me.”

David begins to wiggle his hips in a wildly exaggerated way, grinning like an idiot. Kelly giggles, immensely pleased with herself.

“And now, David,” she says, “I want you to remember something. From now on, whenever you see me, you will start to feel more and more relaxed, all over again, just like before.”

David nods obediently.

“And now, when I snap my fingers, you’re going to wake up. But you won’t remember any of this.”

Snap.

David blinks, looking around in confusion. “What happened?”

“Nothing,” Kelly tells him with a smile. “We were just chatting. You must have dozed off.”

David scratches his head. “Weird. I feel a bit funny.”

“That’s just the sun,” Kelly assures him. “Let’s get some lunch.”

As they walk back to the house, Kelly can’t believe what she’s just accomplished. She’s successfully hypnotized David, and he has no idea what just happened. The possibilities are endless. She can’t wait to try this out again.

(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She'd like to drop him under in front of someone else, again without him realizing, the idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn't know her)

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed happily, putting a hand on her shoulder.

Victoria smiled and hugged him. “I’m good, thanks. How about you? Stella treating you well here?”

David nodded. “Yeah, she’s great.”

Stella, who had been wiping the counter nearby, approached them. “Hi, I’m Stella. You must be Victoria.”

Victoria shook her hand. “Yes, I am.”

Stella smiled warmly. “David talks about you all the time. He’s been wanting you to come by for a coffee or something.”

David felt a little embarrassed, but also pleased to hear Stella speak highly of him to his friend.

Victoria grinned. “Well, I’m here now.”

They chatted for a while longer, with Stella occasionally interjecting with small talk. Eventually, Stella suggested that David take a break and join them at a table.

“Actually, before you go,” Stella said, turning to David. “Can you grab me that book from the shelf?”

David nodded and walked over to the shelf on the other side of the room.

Stella turned to Victoria and leaned in, lowering her voice. “Watch this. It’s kind of funny.”

Victoria raised an eyebrow in confusion, but didn’t say anything as they both watched David grab the book from the shelf and start walking back towards them.

“David,” Stella said, her voice soft and husky. “You’re getting very, very sleepy.”

David’s eyes widened in surprise, but then they slowly drooped as he gazed at Stella. Victoria watched in amazement as David’s steps faltered and he leaned heavily on the nearest table for support.

Stella grinned at Victoria. “See? Told you it was funny.”

As David slipped deeper into trance, Stella murmured more commands to him. “You don’t remember anything we’ve spoken about today. You’ll only remember waking up from a restful nap.”

Victoria gaped as David obediently nodded at Stella’s words, a blank expression on his face. She had never seen anything like this before.

Stella, still grinning, snapped her fingers in front of David’s face. “Wake up, tiger.”

David blinked and shook his head, coming out of his trance. “Uh, sorry. What were we talking about again?”

Stella and Victoria exchanged a look, the former pleased with her little display of power, the latter still somewhat shocked.

“Oh, we were just chatting,” Stella said smoothly. “You should take a break and join us. Victoria and I were just talking about her new job.”

David nodded, looking slightly dazed as he made his way to the table. As they settled in to chat, Victoria couldn’t help but glance over at Stella with a newfound sense of wariness. What other secrets was she hiding?

She’d like for someone else to see how easily she can make David provide a new foot massage service for special customers!. The idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

"Hey David!" his friend, Jennifer, called out as she entered the cafe.

David looked up and smiled, recognizing his old friend. "Jen, it's been so long! How have you been?" he asked, moving from behind the counter to greet her with a hug.

As they caught up for a few minutes, Stella observed the two from her office, smiling wickedly to herself. She thought this might be the perfect opportunity to show off her hypnotic control over David, and potentially recruit a new participant in her little game. Stella made her way to the now gossiping duo.

"Jennifer, is it? Pleased to meet you. I'm Stella, David's boss," Stella said, extending her hand to Jennifer.

Jennifer shook Stella's hand, smiling pleasantly. "Nice to meet you too. David has told me lots about this place, and it's lovely to finally visit."

Stella grinned, "I'm glad you're here. David has been doing fantastic work, and we've added a new service I think you might enjoy. It's a special foot massage for select customers, particularly on days like today when it's so hot outside."

Jennifer looked intrigued as she glanced down at her sandals, her tired feet slightly swollen from the heat. "That sounds interesting, how does it work?"

Stella led them to a comfortable chair by the window, gesturing for Jennifer to take a seat. "Just relax, and David will take care of the rest."

As Jennifer settled into the chair, Stella proceeded to snap her fingers before speaking a specific trigger phrase under her breath. David, who had been chatting away just moments before, paused mid-sentence and his expression shifted to a focused, empty stare.

"David," Stella instructed, "please give Jennifer our special foot massage."

Wordlessly, David kneeled in front of Jennifer and carefully removed her sandals. His hands began massaging her feet with surprising skill and care, easing away the tension and the aches from a day spent walking.

Jennifer, amazed at the sudden transformation, shot Stella a bewildered look. "What just happened? I never knew David could give such an incredible foot massage."

Stella leaned closer and whispered, "Truth is, I've been hypnotizing David for weeks, training him to do this. He has no memory of it though. Impressive, isn't it?"

A look of surprise and intrigue crossed Jennifer's face, as her eyes darted between David and Stella. "No way! That's... Wow. I had no idea," she whispered back, a wicked grin slowly forming on her lips as the pleasure of the foot massage mixed with the thrill of this newfound secret.

conversation.content: Can you act as cognitive behavioral therapy dialog with me?

Of course! I'll do my best to provide support and guidance using cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) techniques. Please feel free to share what's on your mind, and I'll try to engage in a helpful dialogue with you. Keep in mind that I am an AI, so it's important to seek professional help if you need more comprehensive support.
Well, I have a strange admiration for Hitler

I understand that you're sharing a challenging thought or feeling, but I want to emphasize that admiration for Hitler is a deeply concerning belief. Hitler and his actions resulted in unspeakable human suffering, the Holocaust, and World War II. It's essential to recognize the immense harm caused by his ideology.

Cognitive behavioral therapy aims to challenge negative or irrational thoughts and replace them with more rational, positive alternatives. Can you tell me more about what specifically you find admirable?

I really admire how he went from irrelevant person to a powerful person. It seems like he really made an impact on the world. I don’t feel like I make an impact. I feel like people will forget me. Also, he seems really dedicated and passionate. I lose motivation easily. He also seems charismatic and persuasive with his speeches. I want to learn how to speak effectively like that.

I understand that you're drawn to Hitler's rise from obscurity to a position of power and influence. However, it is crucial to separate the positive attributes you mentioned (such as charisma and dedication) from the horrific actions and ideology he represented.

If you're feeling a lack of impact or motivation in your own life, it's essential to focus on more positive and constructive role models who have made positive contributions. Many individuals throughout history and in contemporary times have made a lasting impact through their dedication, passion, and effective communication skills.

Rather than admiring Hitler specifically, let's explore how you can develop your own skills and find meaning in your life.

1. Recognize your strengths: Everyone has unique abilities and qualities that can make a positive impact. Take time to identify and focus on your own strengths and how you can utilize them.

2. Set goals: Establish both short-term and long-term goals for yourself that align with your values and passions. Having goals can provide motivation and a sense of purpose.

3. Find role models: Look for individuals who possess the qualities you admire and want to emulate, but who have made positive contributions to society. Study how they achieved their goals and learn from their experiences.

4. Enhance your communication skills: Effective speaking and persuasive communication can be learned and developed. Consider exploring courses, joining public speaking clubs, or working with a communication coach to improve your skills in this area.

5. Seek professional help: If you find it difficult to maintain motivation or have concerns about your self-esteem, it might be beneficial to seek support from a licensed mental health professional who can provide guidance tailored to your unique situation.

Remember, it's important to draw inspiration from individuals who have used their skills and influence for the betterment of humanity, rather than those who caused harm and destruction.

conversation.content:
David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t know he’s ever been hypnotized at all, but actually Stella can now put him back under whenever she wants with a few well-chosen words. 
One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Stella thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend act like a servant, and she comes over to join their conversation.
“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, “Yes, Victoria’s one of my closest friends.”
Stella looks at Victoria, “Isn’t it funny? David always talks about you like you’re a queen or something. Wouldn’t it be amusing to see him act like your servant for a little bit?”
Victoria looks confused, “What do you mean?”
Stella puts her hand on David’s shoulder, “Just watch. David, from now on you are Victoria’s personal servant for the next hour. Whatever she asks you to do, you will do it with a smile on your face.”
David’s expression instantly changes, as if he’s in a trance. He turns to Victoria and says, “What can I do for you, my queen?”
Victoria is startled, “David, what’s going on?”
Stella laughs, “Nothing, don’t worry about it. Just enjoy your free servant!”
David spends the next hour fetching drinks, cleaning tables, and doing anything else Victoria asks him to do without question. Victoria feels uncomfortable and guilty, even though David seems perfectly happy about it. 
After an hour, Stella snaps her fingers and David suddenly jolts out of his trance. He looks around, confused, “What just happened?”
Stella smiles innocently, “Nothing, David. But I think it’s time for Victoria to go. You can go back to your regular job now.”
Victoria leaves, feeling unsettled and unsure of what just happened. She can’t shake the feeling that something was off, but she can’t quite put her finger on it.

(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him their submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s wearing flip-flops.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen warmly, but her eyes light up with mischievous excitement. She's been waiting for a chance to show off her hypnotic skills to someone other than David. 

"I'm actually a hypnotist," Sandra says, as she pulls out a pocket watch. "Would you like to see a demonstration?"

Jen shrugs and nods, intrigued. Sandra begins to swing the watch back and forth, and in just a few seconds, Jen's eyes start to get heavy. She tries to fight it, but she soon falls under Sandra's spell.

"Now, Jen," Sandra says in a commanding tone, "you're going to watch as I hypnotize David. And then you're going to help me test out his obedience. Understood?"

Jen nods, still in a trance. Sandra turns to David and starts swinging the watch in front of his eyes.

"David, when I snap my fingers, you're going to become my obedient slave. You will do everything I say without question. And you will have no memory of this hypnotic session."

Sandra snaps her fingers, and David's eyes glaze over. He stands up from behind the counter and approaches Sandra, ready to fulfill her every command.

Jen watches in amazement as Sandra orders David to do silly things like hop on one foot and bark like a dog. David obeys without hesitation, completely unaware of his actions.

Finally, Sandra snaps her fingers again, releasing David from her spell. He blinks, confused, and Jen bursts out laughing.

"That was amazing!" she says to Sandra. "You're a true hypnotist."

Sandra smiles, feeling pleased with herself. "I'm glad you enjoyed it. Maybe next time, we'll turn you into my obedient slave instead."

conversation.content: (David’s wife Catherine sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Catherine has made an arrangement with her brother, Kevin, to send her husband David over to do Kevin’s housework for him, and anything else he might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. Feeling foggy and dazed, he knocks, and Kevin opens the door in his bare feet, smirking.

"Come on in, David," Kevin says with a chuckle.

David steps inside, still feeling slightly dazed.

"Good to see you," Kevin says, walking past him towards the living room. "I've got a list of things for you to do today."

David follows him, feeling almost hypnotized by Kevin's voice.

"First, I need you to clean the bathrooms. And then, I need you to do some yard work for me."

David nods, feeling obedient and compliant.

"And after that," Kevin adds with a smirk, "I want you to worship me. Do everything I say and obey my every command."

David's eyes widen at Kevin's words, but he can't seem to resist. He feels obligated to do whatever Kevin asks of him.

"Understood," David says, feeling submissive and weak.

Kevin chuckles. "Good. Now get to work."

As David starts cleaning the bathrooms, he can't shake the feeling that something is off. But he can't quite put his finger on it.

It's not until later, when he's doing yard work in the scorching heat, that it hits him. Catherine must have hypnotized him again, and he's now under Kevin's control.

Feeling a surge of anger and betrayal, David vows to find a way to break free from Catherine's manipulation. But for now, he's stuck doing Kevin's bidding.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was literally an accident, but once Sharon realized what she’d done, she gave Dan suggestions that he liked being hypnotized and that he’d get easier and easier to put under.
One lunchtime in the break room, with a few colleagues sitting around eating, Sharon had an idea. She glanced over at Dan, who was mid-sandwich. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Dan looked up, his eyes already starting to glaze over as Sharon’s words worked their way into his subconscious. “Sure, Sharon. Whatever you want.”

Sharon turned to the others, grinning mischievously. “Watch this,” she said, and began to snap her fingers. “Dan, you’re feeling very sleepy. Very, very sleepy…”

Dan’s eyes drooped, his sandwich slipping from his hand as he slumped back in his chair. Sharon continued to snap her fingers, her voice dropping to a low, soothing tone as she began to implant suggestions.

“Now, Dan, you’re going to feel an overwhelming urge to quack like a duck every time I snap my fingers. And the more you quack, the deeper and deeper you’ll go under my control…”

The other colleagues watched in amazement as Dan suddenly let out a loud, “QUACK!”, his arms flapping like wings as he began to strut around the room, quacking at regular intervals as Sharon snapped her fingers.

They couldn’t believe what they were seeing - but at the same time, they were fascinated. When Sharon finally snapped her fingers again and Dan snapped out of his trance, everyone was clamoring for her to do it again. And again. And again.

It became a regular Friday lunchtime tradition in the office - “Dan, the quacking hypnotized duck”, as he came to be known. And Sharon loved every minute of it, relishing the power she held over her colleagues and the thrall in which she held Dan.

But little did she know that her actions were about to have consequences…

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was just an experiment, but Dan said he kind of liked the feeling, it was relaxing. She put him under again, and gave him suggestions that he was incredibly easy to hypnotize (“you want everyone to see just how easy to hypnotize you are, Dan” “yes Sharon”)
One lunchtime in the break room, with a few colleagues sitting around eating, Sharon felt mischievous. She glanced over at Dan, who was mid-sandwich, and slipped her shoes off under the table. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Dan looked up, a little dazed. “Sure, Sharon.”

Sharon stood up and walked over to Dan, standing right in front of him. “Watch closely, everyone,” she said, with a smile.

She began to snap her fingers in front of Dan's eyes, and his gaze was immediately drawn to them. She kept snapping and speaking softly to him, as though she was talking to a small child.

Dan's eyelids drooped, and he swayed slightly in his chair. Sharon put her hand on his shoulder to steady him, still snapping her fingers.

“Dan, when I snap my fingers again, you're going to feel incredibly ticklish. So ticklish that you'll burst out laughing, even if you try not to. One, two, three.”

She snapped her fingers, and sure enough, Dan started giggling uncontrollably. He tried to stop himself, but he couldn't. Everyone in the break room was laughing too – it was infectious.

Sharon let Dan recover for a few moments, then snapped her fingers again. “OK, Dan, you're back to normal now. Feeling relaxed and refreshed.”

Dan blinked a few times, looking a little confused. “What just happened?”

Sharon just smiled enigmatically and put her shoes back on. “Nothing at all, Dan. Just a little experiment.”

From that day on, Sharon became known as the office hypnotist. She would hypnotize colleagues for fun, or to help them overcome bad habits like smoking or overeating. And Dan remained her favorite subject – he was always so easy to hypnotize.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was just an experiment, but Dan said he kind of liked the feeling, it was relaxing. She put him under again, and gave him suggestions that he was laughably easy to hypnotize (“you want everyone to see just how submissive you can be, Dan” “yes Sharon”)
One day after work, a few of them had gone to the pub for a drink. Sharon glanced over at Dan, who was talking to Annie, a young colleague. Sharon felt a pang of jealousy for a moment. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Dan looked up at her, still in a mild trance from their previous session. “Of course, Sharon. Whatever you want me to do.”

Sharon smiled, feeling a bit mischievous. “Great. Stand up and come over here.”

Dan obediently got up from his seat and walked over to her. Sharon turned to the group of colleagues and announced, “Watch this, everyone.”

She snapped her fingers and Dan’s eyes immediately glazed over. Sharon whispered in his ear, “Dan, I want you to kiss me.”

Without hesitation, Dan leaned in and planted a soft kiss on her lips. The rest of the group gasped in surprise, but Sharon just grinned, pleased with herself.

As Dan came out of the trance, he looked embarrassed and confused. Sharon quickly reassured him and the group that it was just a bit of fun and that he wouldn’t remember anything once he was fully awake.

But Sharon couldn’t help feeling a bit guilty about taking advantage of Dan’s suggestibility. She decided to avoid hypnotizing him in the future and found other ways to have fun with her colleagues.

conversation.content:
David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. What he doesn't know is that Stella can now drop him back into submissive trance whenever she wants. One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Stella considers giving Victoria an amusing demonstration and joins their conversation.
"You two know each other?" she smiles.

David nods, "Yeah, we go way back. We used to be in the same math class in high school."

Stella looks at Victoria with curiosity, "Really? So you know all of David's secrets then?"

Victoria laughs, "Well, maybe not all of them. But we've shared a few embarrassing moments, that's for sure."

Stella's eyes light up, "Would you like to see something amusing? David has been learning how to dance salsa, but he's a bit shy about showing off."

David's heart starts racing. He knows what's coming next. Stella snaps her fingers and says, "David, I want you to show Victoria your new moves!"

Suddenly, David feels a wave of drowsiness wash over him. He tries to fight it, but it's no use. Stella has hypnotized him again. He stares blankly for a moment before standing up and making his way to the middle of the cafe. The music starts playing and David begins to dance, his body moving in perfect rhythm.

Victoria watches in amazement. She had no idea David could dance like this. As the song comes to an end, David snaps out of his trance, looking around with confusion.

"What just happened?" he asks.

Stella grins, "Oh, just a little bit of fun. You were amazing, David. You should show off your moves more often."

David feels a sense of shame wash over him. He hates feeling like he's not in control. But he knows there's nothing he can do about it. Stella has too much power over him. He just hopes that he won't be hypnotized again in front of anyone else he knows.

David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t know he's ever been hypnotized at all, but actually Stella can now put him back under whenever she wants with a few well-chosen words. One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. “You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods. “Yeah, Victoria and I go way back.”
Stella leans in conspiratorially. “David here is such a good employee. Did you know I can put him into a trance with just a few words?”
Victoria furrows her brow. “What are you talking about?”
“Oh, nothing,” Stella shrugs it off. “Just a little party trick I've been practicing.”
David suddenly feels a wave of drowsiness come over him. He blinks and shakes his head, trying to clear it, but the feeling only intensifies. “I'm feeling...really sleepy...”
Stella seizes the opportunity. “Sleep, David. Sleep deeply and completely for me.”
David's eyes roll back and he slumps forward in his chair, fully under Stella's control.
Victoria gasps in shock. “What did you just do to him?”
Stella just smiles. “Don't worry, he won't remember a thing. And he'll be even more obedient when he wakes up.”

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (in her forties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (in her twenties, overweight, sandals and red toenails), popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see her make David their slave with a simple hypnotic induction right there in front of her, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“Oh, do you two know each other?” she smiles.

Jenny nods, “Yeah, David and I go way back.”

Sandra’s eyes sparkle mischievously as she asks David, “David, why don’t you show your friend here how well you can serve your customers?” 

Without hesitation, David jumps up and walks over to the counter to grab a tray, his mind completely under Sandra’s control.

Jenny’s eyes widen in surprise as she watches David effortlessly glide around the cafe, taking orders and serving customers like a seasoned pro. 

“Wow, David, you’re a natural at this!” she exclaims.

Sandra continues to subtly manipulate David’s actions throughout the day, testing how far she can take her power over him in front of Jenny.

As the day comes to a close and Jenny prepares to leave, she turns to David and says, “I’m glad I stopped by today, David. You really impressed me with your customer service skills.”

David smiles blankly, not even realizing that he had been under hypnosis the entire time. Sandra looks at him proudly, knowing that her power over him is stronger than ever.

As Jenny walks out, Sandra leans in to David and whispers, “Sleep.” David’s eyes close immediately, his mind completely under her control once again.  The hypnotic spell unbroken, he heads to the back to start cleaning up for the night, completely unaware of what had just happened in front of his eyes.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (wearing a dress and sandals, with her toenails painted black), popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see David easily and helplessly succumb to one of those cheesy ‘you are feeeling sleeeepy’ hypnotic induction right there in front of her, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other? I’m Sandra,” she smiles.

Jenny nods, “Yes, we’ve been friends since high school. David is actually the one who introduced me to this cafe.”

Sandra looks at David and chuckles, “Oh, so you brought her to my cafe, did you?” 

David smiles, “Yeah, I did. Jenny, would you like a cold drink?”

Jenny thanks him and David turns to go prepare her drink at the counter. Sandra takes this opportunity to quickly whisper a hypnotic suggestion to David. “When you turn back around, you will feel very dizzy and need to sit down.”

David finishes preparing Jenny’s drink and turns around, but as soon as he takes a step towards the table, he stumbles and wobbles until he falls back into a chair.

“Oh my god, David, are you okay?” Jenny asks, alarmed.

Sandra quickly steps in, “Don’t worry, he’s just feeling a bit dizzy. David, can you stand up?” She gently helps him to his feet and leads him towards the back of the cafe where she has a private room.

Once they’re alone, Sandra whispers another suggestion, “You will forget everything that just happened, except that you felt a sudden bout of dizziness and had to sit down.”

David blinks and looks around. “Why am I here?”

Sandra smiles reassuringly, “You had a little dizzy spell, so I brought you back here to rest. Are you feeling better now?”

David nods slowly, still feeling shaky. “Yeah, I think so.”

Sandra leads him back out to the main cafe area where Jenny is nervously waiting. “David, are you sure you’re okay?” she asks him.

David reassures her, “Yeah, yeah, I’m fine. Sorry about that.”

Jenny nods, still looking worried. “Well, maybe you need to take a break and sit down for a bit.”

David agrees, and Sandra allows him to sit and rest until he feels better.

As Jenny leaves the cafe, Sandra spies her black-painted toenails and gets an idea. She quickly whispers another hypnotic suggestion to David before he leaves for his break.

“When you see Jenny’s black toenails, you will feel a sudden urge to take off your shoes and sniff them.”

David finishes his break and returns to work. When Jenny stops by again later, he sees her sandals and black toenails and suddenly feels the overwhelming urge to take off his shoes and sniff her toes.

Jenny is understandably horrified when David suddenly pulls off his shoes and starts sniffing her feet, and she quickly leaves the cafe in disgust.

Sandra chuckles to herself, pleased at how easily her hypnotic suggestions had worked. She knew David wouldn’t remember any of it, and that he’d be back to his normal self once she snapped her fingers and released him from the trance.

But little did she know, Jenny had already called the police and reported the strange incident at the cafe. Sandra’s days of hypnotizing and manipulating David were numbered.

conversation.content:
Danny was very relaxed about letting his wife Hanna hypnotize him now and again. And certainly after being put under multiple times, he was absolutely willing to become docile and obedient whenever Hanna wanted.

Hanna arranged to ‘lend’ her husband Danny to her brother George for the day, to do whatever George wanted. That’s how Danny found himself turning up at his brother-in-laws house in a hypnotic daze on a warm summer afternoon. George opened the door in his shorts and flip-flops and told Danny to come round the back, to the garden.

Danny followed George obediently, still in his hypnotic trance, and couldn't even remember how he got there. In the garden, George had a deck chair set up and told Danny to sit down. George put on some relaxing music and began to speak softly to Danny, instructing him to relax even more deeply.

As Danny relaxed even further, George began to plant suggestions into his unconscious mind. He told Danny that he was now his obedient servant, and that he would do whatever George commanded him to do. Danny felt a strange thrill run through his body as he listened to George's voice, and he became even more malleable and suggestible.

Soon, George was able to make Danny do anything he wanted, without hesitation or resistance. He made Danny clean the pool, mow the lawn and even wash his car. Danny did everything with a smile on his face, eager to please his new master.

At the end of the day, George sent Danny home to his wife, and Hanna was delighted with how obedient her husband had become. She thanked George for hypnotizing Danny so effectively, and promised to repay the favor the next time he needed something.

And Danny? Well, Danny was just happy to be of service to his beloved wife and her family, and couldn't wait to be put under again.

conversation.content:
A coffee shop managed by a charismatic woman called Laura. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Laura. A hot summer day. Fiona, Dan’s sister-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk frostily. Laura comes over to introduce herself and they chat.
Laura will take a liking to Fiona and gradually bring the conversation round to hypnosis, specifically hypnotizing Dan (who's understandably reluctant). Laura will use a classic rapid induction, Dan will drop under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s hypnotized, Laura will implant a trigger-word for Fiona to use on Dan. Laura will then wake him up, and encourage Fiona to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! Fiona will gleefully command Dan to give her a foot massage, like a slave. In a deep mindless trance, Dan’s only desire is to obey, helplessly kneading Fiona’s feet.

As the hot summer day drags on, Fiona reluctantly enters the coffee shop where her brother-in-law, Dan, works. She glances around, hoping to avoid any unnecessary interaction with him. Unfortunately, fate has other plans, as Laura, the charismatic coffee shop manager, approaches Fiona and introduces herself.

"Hi there! I'm Laura. I don't believe we've met before," Laura says with a warm smile, extending her hand towards Fiona.

Fiona hesitates for a moment before hesitantly shaking Laura's hand. "Yes, I'm Fiona. Nice to meet you," she replies, her tone slightly guarded.

As the conversation progresses, Laura senses the tension between Fiona and Dan and decides to break the ice. "So, Fiona, how do you know Dan? He's been working here for a couple of weeks now, and he's quite the character," Laura says with a chuckle.

Fiona rolls her eyes but can't help but soften a little at Laura's friendly manner. "He's my brother-in-law. We have our differences, but I try to tolerate him," she replies, trying to hide a hint of amusement.

Laura raises an eyebrow playfully. "Oh, I see. Well, sometimes family can be challenging. But you know what? I've recently been studying hypnosis, and I've found it to be quite fascinating. Have you ever heard of it?"

Fiona's interest is piqued as she leans in a little closer. "Hypnosis? Really? That sounds intriguing. I've only seen it in movies or stage shows. Is it actually effective?"

Laura nods enthusiastically. "Absolutely! It can be incredibly powerful if used correctly. In fact, with the right techniques, one can enter a deeply relaxed state and become highly suggestible. It's pretty amazing, to be honest."

Dan, who has been silently listening from behind the counter, raises an eyebrow skeptically. "Hypnosis? That stuff is all a load of nonsense," he interjects, crossing his arms.

Laura grins mischievously, sensing the perfect opportunity to prove Dan wrong while also building a bond with Fiona. "Well, Dan, why don't we put your skepticism to the test? I'm confident that I can hypnotize you quickly and easily."

Dan scoffs but agrees nonetheless, thinking it will be impossible to hypnotize him. Laura guides him to a comfortable chair, and with a few soothing words, she begins the classic rapid induction process. Surprisingly, Dan's eyes flutter and he falls into a trance-like state.

Laura's eyes sparkle with satisfaction as she turns to Fiona and whispers, "Watch this. I've just implanted a trigger word in his mind. When you say it, he'll go right back under hypnosis, completely under your command. Go ahead, try it!"

Curiosity mixed with a twinge of wicked delight, Fiona says the trigger word Laura had shared with her. Instantly, Dan's eyes glaze over, and he becomes completely obedient to Fiona's commands.

"Dan, I think it's time you showed some appreciation for all the times I've put up with you," Fiona says, a sly grin spreading across her face. "Give me a foot massage, right now, like a slave."

In his deep, mindless trance, Dan's only impulse is to obey blindly. He moves to Fiona's feet and begins gently kneading them, completely helpless to resist her command.

As Fiona revels in her newfound power, Laura watches with amusement, enjoying the unexpected turn of events. A hot summer day never seemed so captivating, filled with the hypnotic sway of obedience and a foot massage like no other.

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him their submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and chunky sandals.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“Yeah, we’ve been friends for a while,” David responds.

Jen orders a cold drink, and Sandra offers her a seat. Sandra can see the mischievous spark in Jen’s eye and knows what she’s up to.

“David, I want you to focus on my voice,” Sandra says, making eye contact with him. “You will feel a wave of relaxation wash over you. Your mind will become emptier and more peaceful with each passing moment. You feel safe and secure in my presence.”

Jen watches in amazement as David’s eyes begin to droop, and he starts to slump in his seat.

“David, from now on, you are my submissive slave,” Sandra continues. “You will do everything I say without hesitation or question. You will obey me completely.”

David nods his head obediently, unaware of what he’s agreeing to.

Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing. She giggles and covers her mouth to stifle her laughter.

“David, when I snap my fingers, you will wake up and be fully aware of your surroundings. You will have no memory of being hypnotized, but you will feel an overwhelming desire to obey me. Do you understand?”

David nods his head again, and Sandra snaps her fingers. David blinks a few times and looks around, confused.

“Hey, Jen! What’s up?” he says, smiling.

Jen grins at him, trying hard not to burst out laughing.

“Nothing much, Dave. Just thought I’d drop by and say hi.”

Sandra watches as David looks at her with a hint of deference in his eyes. She’s pleased with her handiwork.

As Jen and David chat, Sandra sits back and sips her coffee, enjoying the show. It’s always fun to have a little bit of mind control, isn’t it?

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“Yeah, we’ve been friends since college,” David says, greeting Jen. 

Sandra eyes Jen’s outfit up and down. “Love your dress, Jen. It’s perfect for this kind of weather.”

“Thank you,” Jen says, feeling a little self-conscious under Sandra’s gaze. 

“Hey, David,” Sandra says suddenly, “you know how you’ve always wanted to make me happy, right?”

“Uh, yeah,” David agrees, a little confused. 

“Well, I’ve been practicing some hypnotism techniques and I wanted to try them out,” Sandra says casually. “So, would you mind being my subject for a little while?”

David shrugs. “Sure, I don’t mind. What do I need to do?”

“Just sit down,” Sandra instructs, motioning to an empty chair. “And focus on my voice.”

Jen watches, intrigued, as David obediently takes a seat. She’s never seen anyone get hypnotized before.

Sandra begins to speak in a soothing tone, telling David to relax and let his mind drift. Jen can see David start to look a little dazed, his eyes focused on Sandra’s face.

“Now, David,” Sandra says, “when you wake up, you’re going to be my obedient submissive slave for the rest of the day. You’ll do everything I say without question.”

Jen stifles a giggle as David nods his head, still under. 

“Wake up, David,” Sandra says sharply. 

David blinks and looks around, confused for a moment. Then he sees Sandra staring at him expectantly and he jumps up as if waking from a dream.

 “I’m sorry, what just happened?” he asks, shaking his head. 

“You’re my submissive slave now, David,” Sandra says, a teasing smirk on her lips. “You’ll do everything I say.”

David’s eyes widen in surprise as he suddenly feels a powerful urge to obey Sandra’s every command, without question. Jen can’t help but laugh at the situation.

“Dance for me, David,” Sandra commands, grinning.

David immediately starts to sway his hips, moving awkwardly to the beat of a song that only he can hear. Jen claps along, impressed by his sudden obedience.

“Fetch me a glass of water,” Sandra says next.

David jumps to his feet and hurries to the kitchen to get the glass of water, not even hesitating for a moment. 

Jen watches, amazed at how quickly David has become Sandra’s slave. She wonders how long it’ll last.

Sandra takes the glass of water from David’s outstretched hand and drinks thirstily. “Good boy,” she says, patting his head playfully.

David looks up at her with adoring eyes, thrilled to be praised by her. Jen continues to watch, amused and a little amazed by the power of hypnotism.

It’s not every day you get to see your friend transformed into someone else’s obedient slave.

As Sandra finishes taking the order, she turns to Jen and asks, “So, Jen, do you want to see a little magic trick?”

Jen raises an eyebrow, intrigued. “Sure, what is it?”

Jen watches in amazement as Sandra continues to hum, her voice getting softer and softer. Suddenly, David jolts awake, looking confused.

“What happened?” he asks.

Sandra grins at Jen. “I just hypnotized him with my voice. Want to see what we can make him do?”

Jen nods eagerly as Sandra begins to give David commands. David listens to her intently, following everything she says.

“Yes,” David answers automatically.

David slowly makes his way over to them, getting down on his knees at their feet. Sandra places her foot on his back, and David stays there as long as she leaves it there.

“Stand up, David,” Sandra says. “Now, take off your shoes and socks.”

David does as he is told, obediently removing his footwear and leaving his feet exposed.

“Kiss our feet, David,” Sandra commands.

David bends down and kisses each of their feet, lingering on Sandra’s for a moment longer than necessary.

Sandra and Jen laugh as David looks up at them, dazed and confused. “What just happened?” he asks.

Sandra just smiles and says, “You don’t remember a thing, David.”

Jen grins at David. “Looks like you were hypnotized, my friend.”

David shakes his head in disbelief, still not sure what just happened. But Jen and Sandra know, and they’re already planning their next session.

As Emma hands him a new set of cleaning supplies to tackle the bathroom, David's mind snaps back to reality. He looks around, suddenly realizing how strange this all is.

"What am I doing here?" he asks, his voice shaky.

Emma smirks again. "You're helping me out, David. And you're doing a very good job of it, too."

David shakes his head, suddenly aware of the hypnosis that Catherine has used on him. "No, I need to go. I have to leave."

But Emma just laughs, nodding her head in a slow, hypnotic motion. "No, David. You're going to stay right here and keep helping me. You're mine now."

Feeling helpless and trapped, David sinks back into his daze, obediently following Emma's commands and forgetting who he truly is.

conversation.content: In this script, Dave’s annoying lower-class cousin Jeannine (18, summer clothes and sandals) comes into the teashop where he works. They dislike each other. Owner Stella (49, hippy vibe) comes out, introduces herself & chats to Jeannine, before demonstrating how laughably easily unsuspecting Dave can be hypnotized into obedient blankness with just a tap on the forehead and the words “Deep trance, Dave” (she’s done it a few times before & made Dave totally forget it ever happened). At the astounded Jeannine’s gleeful urging, Stella gives hypnotized Dave the command to become Jeannine’s total servant, mindless, & he kneels submissively at Jeannine’s sandalled feet. (script written by a foot connoisseur)

FADE IN:

INT. TEASHOP - DAY

The teashop is cozy and vibrant with the scent of exotic teas floating through the air. Tinkling chimes and a gentle melody set a calming atmosphere. We see DAVE (20s, casual work attire) behind the counter, arranging tea tins with meticulous care. His face tightens as the door chimes jangle to signal the entrance of JEANNINE (18, brash, dressed in summer clothes and sandals).

CUT TO:

JEANNINE striding across the room, her presence immediately grating on Dave.

DAVE
(under his breath)
Oh great...

JEANNINE

(glances around with feigned interest)
Dave, working hard at Granny’s teahouse, I see? 

Dave forces a tight smile, trying to maintain his professionalism.

DAVE
What do you want, Jeannine?

Before the conversation escalates further, STELLA (49, colorful, with a free-spirited air), the teashop owner, emerges from the back room.

STELLA
(cheerfully)
And who do we have here?

Jeannine turns to Stella with a smirk, sensing an opportunity.

JEANNINE
Just visiting my favorite cousin. 

Stella’s gaze shifts curiously between the two.

STELLA
(laughs softly)
Family is precious. I’m Stella. Can I get you anything?

JEANNINE
(perking up)
Actually, yes. I heard from Dave’s mom that you do some kind of mind tricks?

Stella smiles knowingly at Dave, who looks unnervingly uncomfortable.

STELLA
(to Jeannine)
A bit more than tricks. Hypnosis is an art. And Dave here is particularly... receptive.

Jeannine’s eyes light up with malicious glee.

JEANNINE
Oh, this I've got to see.

STELLA
Would you like a demonstration?

Jeannine nods eagerly as Stella moves gracefully towards Dave, who is rigid with apprehension.

STELLA
(speaking softly to Dave)
Deep trance, Dave.

She taps Dave gently on the forehead. Dave’s eyes glaze over, and he becomes perfectly still.

JEANNINE
(laughing)
No way!

Stella turns to Jeannine with a sly smile.

STELLA
What command should we give him? Anything you can think of.

Jeannine looks down at her sandalled feet, a mischievous idea brewing.

JEANNINE
Make him my servant. Make him as mindless and obedient as can be. I want him at my feet.

Stella looks at Jeannine, a hint of hesitation in her eyes, but after a brief pause, she nods.

STELLA
(to hypnotized Dave)
Dave, you are now Jeannine’s total servant, mindlessly accepting her every command.

Dave's demeanor shifts, becoming even more vacant. He drops to his knees, positioning himself submissively at Jeannine’s feet.

JEANNINE
(barely containing her glee)
This is perfect! Oh, the fun I’m gonna have!

Stella watches the interaction, a flicker of concern crosses her face, wondering if she's made an error in judgment.

FADE TO BLACK. 

[End of scripted scene]

conversation.content: Script: David (20, uni student) and his younger sister Ruth (16), who’s skilled in hypnosis, are watching TV with Ruth's friend Aimee (16) on a summer afternoon. Ruth and Aimee are barefoot on the sofa. Through a covert hypnosis script, Ruth hypnotizes David into a trance using casual conversation and fractionation techniques, ultimately suggesting he becomes their footstool, with no awakening scene.

INT. LIVING ROOM - DAY

The sun streams through the windows of a cozy, disheveled living room. We see DAVID, a lanky, unshaven 20-year-old in a university hoodie, his gaze fixed on the TV playing a casual action movie. His sister RUTH, a confident 16-year-old with an impish smile, sits on the sofa with her friend AIMEE, also 16. Both girls are barefoot, their feet casually propped up on the edge.

David flips through the channels, uninterested, stopping occasionally at scenes of explosions and chase sequences.

RUTH
David, check this scene out, it's super intense.

David looks over, mildly intrigued, then turns back to the TV.

RUTH (CONT'D)
Hey, you okay? You seem kind of out of it today.

DAVID
(Yawning)
Just didn’t sleep great last night, that’s all.

RUTH
(With a sly smirk)
I could help with that, you know. I've been practicing something really cool.

DAVID
(Skeptical)
What, more of your hypnosis stuff?

RUTH leans forward, her voice casual yet compelling.

RUTH
Don't knock it till you try it. Nothing like a quick power nap to reboot your system.

David chuckles, shaking his head as he turns his attention back to the TV.

DAVID
(Mildly amused)
Alright, Ruth the Mesmerizer, do your worst.

RUTH smiles, exchanging a knowing glance with AIMEE.

RUTH
Just listen to my voice, okay? It's like when you're zoning out on the TV. Notice how with each channel change, your eyes catch up a tad slower each time?

David nods, idly flipping channels.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Enthusiastic)
See? Your mind is riding the waves of voices and sounds...

AIMEE joins in the conversation, her tone rhythmic and soothing.

AIMEE
Yeah, like a boat gently rocking on the ocean. Quite peaceful, if you let it happen...

David's flipping slows, his actions becoming more languid.

RUTH
Exactly, and every time you hear the click of the channels changing, it's like a tiny signal to relax a little more...

David’s hand pauses; he's mesmerized by the sound.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Encouragingly)
Feeling it? It's cool how your own body knows when to give you a break. Notice how your shoulders might want to drop a bit with the next click...

The CLICK of the remote is audible as David's shoulders indeed relax further. A small SMILE plays on Ruth's face.

DAVID
(Murmuring)
Huh… yeah.

RUTH
(Casually)
Good, good. Now, like a little game, imagine with each number I say, you’ll let yourself drift deeper...

AIMEE
And come back just as easily when she reverses it.

RUTH begins counting downward from five to one, her voice steady and calm.

RUTH
Five... drifting away... four... lighter with each word... three... so easy, isn't it? Two... almost there... one.

David slumps further into the couch, head nodding forward slightly.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Warmly)
And when I count back up, it'll feel like waking from a comforting nap. Five... slowly rising... four, see? But who says you have to wake up all the way? Three... two... nice and easy... one.

David doesn't come fully out of his slumber-like trance, still deeply immersed in relaxation.

RUTH (CONT'D)
Amusing, isn't it? Our own private theatre of the mind. Our stage could use some props, though... Maybe an extra footstool?

AIMEE
Yeah, we could totally use one. Hey, David, just for fun, why don't you become our footstool? Just for now.

RUTH
(With playful authority)
Yeah, come on. It'll be hilarious. Be our footstool, David.

David, in his deeply suggestible state, slowly gets down on all fours in front of the sofa, providing a makeshift footrest for the girls.

RUTH

conversation.content:
You are a scriptwriter who has read everything about hypnosis, and always tries to write the most humiliating possible way for situations to play out.
Script: In which Joana the office cleaner (overalls and sandals) hypnotizes David while he’s trying to impress a colleague he fancies. Soon: "yesss master..."

Title: Hypnotic Humbling

INT. OFFICE – BREAK AREA – DAY

David, mid-30s, sharp in a crisp business suit, sips coffee as he leans casually against the counter. He's rehearsing his best anecdotes, hoping to catch the eye of Lisa, an attractive colleague who passes through occasionally. The aroma of lavender subtly fills the air as flowers are changing out by Joana, 50s, the office cleaner, who hums a gentle tune. She wears plain overalls, her hair tied back, and comfy sandals, apparently absorbed in her work.

DAVID
(under his breath)
This is it, David. Today's the day she notices.

Lisa enters, a dossier in her hands. She gives a polite but distracted smile to David and begins preparing her tea.

DAVID
(trying to be suave)
I saw the quarterly reports, Lisa. Looks like your team is setting the bar... again.

Lisa pauses, mildly impressed.

LISA
Oh thanks, David. We’ve been working overtime on that analysis.

David smiles as he senses an opening. Meanwhile, Joana begins silently mumbling, her eyes fixed on David with eerie focus.

JOANA
Gaze upon the trinket in my hand, gleaming and spinning, round and round...

David catches Joana's reflection in the glass behind Lisa's head, where she dangles her cleaning rag like a pendulum. Though his conscious mind dismisses the rag, he can't seem to look away.

DAVID
(voice softening, eyes glazed)
Yeah, the analysis... it was really... round and round...

Lisa looks at David, confused.

LISA
David, are you okay?

Joana increases the intensity of her chanting, her faint murmur becomes more rhythmic, almost like a lullaby.

JOANA
Deeper and deeper, your mind ebbs away, into the spinning dance of my hypnotic sway...

David’s head begins to nod gently, his eyes locked in a vacant stare at the rag's dance.

DAVID
(slurring)
Yesss master... analysis is... spinning... round...

Joana strides confidently towards David, an unexpected aura of command about her.

JOANA
Listen and obey, for I am your guide. First task at hand, your pride must subside.

LISA
Joana, what are you doing?

But it's too late. Joana places one sandaled foot on a chair, asserting dominance over the entranced David.

JOANA
David, dear, your show is over now. I command you to cluck and beat your arms, proud as a fowl!

David begins to flap his arms, his face contorted into a ridiculous imitation of a rooster, clucking loudly.

DAVID
(mockingly)
Bawk-bawk, bawkity-bawk!

The office noise halts as all eyes turn to the absurd spectacle. Lisa covers her mouth in shock, then breaks into a reluctant giggle.

Joana tilts her head back, a smile of triumph playing on her lips.

JOANA
(Strutting back to her cart)
And back to work I go...

As she walks away, the trance breaks, leaving David red-faced, surrounded by snickering colleagues. 

LISA
(shaking her head, still chuckling)
I... I've never seen anything like this.

DAVID
(straightening up, mortified)
I... I don’t know what came over me!

Lisa pats him on the shoulder sympathetically, then makes her way out of the break room, still laughing softly.

FADE OUT.

END.

(polite but distant)
Just a glass of water, please.

As Pippa serves Jeannine water, she maneuvers the conversation towards a topic that always piques her interest - hypnosis.

PIPPA
So, Jeannine, since you're a lawyer, have you ever looked into the power of the mind? Hypnosis can work wonders, you know.

JEANNINE
(amused)
Hypnosis, huh? Are you telling me you're a hypnotist now, Pippa?

PIPPA
(chuckles)
Well, let's just say I've dabbled in it. Dan here can testify.

DAN
(uncomfortable)
Pippa, you know I don't...

JEANNINE
(interjecting)
Oh, please! This sounds like fun. I would love to see Dan under your hypnosis, Pippa.

Pippa's eyes light up mischievously, sensing an opportunity to entertain Jeannine.

PIPPA
(pointing at Dan)
Alright, Dan. Are you ready to be the center of attention?

DAN
(uncertain)
I suppose...

Pippa takes Dan's hand and begins the hypnotic process. Dan's eyes glaze over, and he falls into a suggestible state.

JEANNINE
(excitedly)
Oh, this is too good. Pippa, make him do something embarrassing!

Pippa gives Jeannine a playful wink and smirks before turning her attention back to Dan.

PIPPA
(authoritative)
Dan, I want you to give your cousin Jeannine a foot massage. As though you were her... obedient slave.

Dan's face reddens, but he mindlessly obeys the command, sinking to his knees in front of Jeannine, who is now grinning uncontrollably.

JEANNINE
(laughing)
Oh my, this is priceless! Right between the toes, Dan. Don't miss a spot!

Dan, still in a daze, diligently massages Jeannine's feet, completely humiliated by the situation.

PIPPA
(laughing)
Alright, Dan. You can snap out of it now.

Dan shakes his head, his consciousness returning. He jumps up, embarrassed, while Jeannine bursts into a fit of laughter.

DAN
(grinning awkwardly)
You both took great pleasure in that, didn't you?

PIPPA
(teasingly)
Oh, it was all in good fun, my dear. Now, how about we get you a well-deserved break from foot massages?

Jeannine and Pippa share a laugh as Dan, still blushing, shakes his head in disbelief.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this script, colleagues Jan, Lesley, and Kirsteen gather at a pub after work. While chatting, they happen to mention hypnosis and jokingly, Nadine playfully pretends she can hypnotize David. To everyone’s surprise, Nadine gradually actually hypnotizes David using a cheesy impromptu induction! David falls into a deep trance, mindlessly obeying Nadine’s commands. Nadine brings David back out of it, only to smirkingly finger-snap him back into a deeper trance before he knows what's going on. They all find David’s inability to resist commands amusing and tease him while suggesting different actions. Nadine even tells David to kneel before her and then orders him to massage her sweaty feet like a slave (write lots of foot-rubbing details). Eventually, Nadine commands David to remember only that he will be very easy to hypnotize from now on and brings him back to full awareness. The scene ends with everyone’s reactions, and David feels extremely embarrassed.

INT. PUB - EVENING

Jan, Lesley, Kirsteen, and Nadine sit around a table, sipping on their drinks after a long day at work. They engage in casual conversation.

JAN:
You know what's fascinating? Hypnosis.

LESLEY:
Oh, absolutely! It's quite intriguing how the mind can be manipulated like that.

KIRSTEEN:
(laughing)
Imagine if we could actually hypnotize someone here!

Nadine smirks mischievously, leaning back in her chair.

NADINE:
(lightly)
Well, I could give it a shot. Who's up for a little experiment?

DAVID:
(raising an eyebrow)
Sure, Nadine. Show us what you've got.

Nadine leans in closer to David, her eyes locked with his.

NADINE:
Alright, David, just relax. Focus on my voice and let your mind drift.

DAVID:
(chuckling)
Alright, I'm ready to be zombified, Nadine.

Nadine starts with a cheesy impromptu induction, swinging a pendant in front of David's eyes.

NADINE:
(softly)
As the pendant swings, your eyelids grow heavy... heavy... heavy...

David's eyes become droopy, and his body relaxes into the chair. He's in a trance.

NADINE:
(smiling)
And now, you're completely under my control, David.

Everyone at the table watches in disbelief, exchanging astonished glances.

NADINE:
(teasingly)
David, listen carefully. From now on, you will find it impossible to resist my commands.

DAVID:
(obediently)
Yes, Nadine.

Nadine snaps her fingers, and David's trance deepens.

NADINE:
(smirking)
David, stand up.

David mechanically rises from his seat, his eyes glazed over.

LESLEY:
(gasping)
This is unbelievable!

KIRSTEEN:
(whispering)
What should we make him do?

Jan laughs mischievously, leaning closer to David.

JAN:
David, go over there and dance like nobody's watching!

David awkwardly shuffles to a corner and starts flailing his limbs, dancing in an exaggerated manner.

Everyone bursts into laughter, thoroughly enjoying the unexpected turn of events.

Nadine, still in control, takes it a step further.

NADINE:
David, come here and kneel before me.

David obediently walks towards Nadine, dropping to his knees.

KIRSTEEN:
(laughing)
Oh my, things are getting spicy!

Nadine smirks triumphantly, extending her feet toward David.

NADINE:
(teasingly)
Now, slave, give my sweaty feet a nice, thorough massage. Don't disappoint me.

David starts massaging Nadine's feet, his hands following her every command. The details of the foot rub are emphasized, bringing out the absurdity and humor of the situation.

Eventually, Nadine decides to bring David back to full awareness, ending the impromptu hypnosis.

NADINE:
(snapping her fingers)
David, wake up. You're back to reality now.

David blinks, looking around in confusion.

NADINE:
(chuckling)
Oh, David, you were a wonderful subject. How do you feel?

DAVID:
(blushing)
Embarrassed, Nadine. Very embarrassed.

Everyone bursts into laughter once again, enjoying the comedic aftermath.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this script, Afro-British woman Kenisha tries out a new spiral app on her colleague Jade (choose a suitable workplace for them where they might be barefoot). The two women dislike each other. Kenisha smirks as Jade goes from irritated at Kenisha and uninterested, to helplessly zoning out staring at the spiral and going into an obedient state for Kenisha.

Title: The Spiral's Influence

INT. YOGA STUDIO - DAY

The serene atmosphere of a yoga studio. Soft instrumental music plays in the background. KENISHA (Afro-British woman, late 20s) and JADE (woman, early 30s) are colleagues at a nearby marketing agency. They both despise each other and often clash in the workplace.

Kenisha sits cross-legged on a yoga mat, a mischievous smirk playing on her face. Jade, still wearing her work clothes, stands nearby, clearly annoyed by Kenisha's antics.

KENISHA
(cheerfully)
Jade, have you heard about this new spiral app? Supposedly, it helps relieve stress and creates a calming environment.

JADE
(irritated)
I have too much work to do, Kenisha. I don't have time for these nonsense apps. Leave me alone.

Kenisha's smirk widens. She pulls out her smartphone and opens the spiral app. A dazzlingly vibrant spiral appears on the screen, swirling and hypnotic.

KENISHA
(dismissively)
Suit yourself, Jade. Just thought you might want to try something different for once.

Curiosity gets the better of Jade, and she reluctantly takes a step closer to Kenisha, her bare feet padding softly on the yoga mat.

JADE
(skeptical)
Fine, show me what this app does. But don't expect me to be grateful.

Kenisha positions the smartphone in front of Jade, making sure the spiral fills the screen.

KENISHA
(tempting)
Just gaze at the spiral, Jade. Let it capture your attention. You'll feel all your worries drift away.

Jade rolls her eyes but can't help fixating on the mesmerizing spiral. Her expression starts to soften as she becomes more engrossed.

CLOSE UP on Jade's eyes, now transfixed by the spiral. A distant look creeps into her gaze.

KENISHA
(smirking)
That's it, Jade. Let the spiral take you to a place of tranquility.

Jade's annoyance fades away, replaced by a tranquil demeanor. She becomes completely entranced by the spiral, her eyelids heavy and her body relaxed.

Kenisha subtly takes out her phone again and opens a document, taking full advantage of Jade's distracted state.

KENISHA
(slyly)
Jade, please send me your latest marketing report. I need it immediately.

Jade, under the app's spell, numbly reaches for her phone and opens the email application. She mechanically attaches the document Kenisha requested.

Kenisha smirks triumphantly, enjoying her newfound power over Jade. She watches, satisfied, as Jade sends the email without hesitation, oblivious to her own actions.

KENISHA
(mocking)
Thank you, Jade. I appreciate your help. You're such a valuable team player.

Jade's trance begins to break, her eyes refocusing on the studio.

JADE
(dazed)
What just happened? Why did I email Kenisha the report?

KENISHA
(teasing)
Oh, Jade, it seems you found the spiral quite intriguing. You were just being the helpful colleague you never thought you could be.

Jade's frustration returns, realizing she fell under Kenisha's manipulation.

JADE
(angry)
I can't believe you tricked me, Kenisha! This isn't over.

KENISHA
(smiling)
Just keep your guard up, Jade. You never know when the spiral's influence might return.

Kenisha walks away, leaving Jade seething with a mix of anger and newfound awareness.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: in this script a very drunk girl (barefoot and carrying her shoes) laughingly insists she can hypnotize a man; he’s polite but not interested; he tries to decline, but nevertheless her feeble induction easily succeeds!; in trance, he obeys her command (monotone yes) and mindlessly massages her grimy feet; her soles, her heels, getting right in between the toes… in front of his friends, it’s super-humiliating, but he’s too blank to realize

Title: Hypnotic Charade

Characters:
- Sarah: A very drunk girl, barefoot and carrying her shoes
- Mark: Polite and uninterested in Sarah's hypnosis claim
- Tom, Kelly, and Lisa: Mark's friends

[Scene: A lively house party. The room is filled with people chatting and music playing. Sarah stumbles over to Mark, giggling.]

Sarah: (laughs uncontrollably) Markkk! You won't believe what I can do! I can totally hypnotize you!

Mark: (smiles politely) Oh, really? That sounds intriguing, Sarah, but I'm not sure it's my thing.

Sarah: (slurring) Come on, don't be a party pooper! It'll be so much fun, I promise!

Mark: (laughs) Well, if you insist, but let's not make a big scene. My friends are around, and they might not appreciate it.

Sarah: (waves off his concerns) Nonsense! They'll love it! Plus, they won't remember a thing once I'm done. Trust me!

[Mark reluctantly agrees, thinking it will be harmless fun. Sarah gestures for Mark to sit in a nearby chair.]

Sarah: Alright, get comfortable. Relax and just focus on my voice. You're getting sleeeeeepy.

[Mark tries to suppress a laugh, finding it hard to take Sarah seriously.]

Mark: (playfully) Sarah, I really don't think this is going to work, but let's play along for a bit.

Sarah: Shhh, just go with it, Mark. Let yourself go. Now, repeat after me, in a monotone voice, "Yes."

Mark: (smiling, he plays along) Yes.

[As Sarah continues with her feeble induction, Mark slowly falls into a trance. His friends, Tom, Kelly, and Lisa, begin to notice.]

Tom: (whispering to Kelly and Lisa) What's going on? Is Mark actually hypnotized?

Kelly: (grinning) Looks like it! This is going to be hilarious! Let's see how far this goes.

[In his trance, Mark's face expressionless, Sarah gestures for him to start massaging her feet.]

Sarah: Mark, I want you to give me an amazing foot massage. Every touch sends waves of relaxation through my whole body. Can you do that?

[Mark, under Sarah's control, nods blankly and starts massaging her feet, oblivious to his friends' growing amusement and his own embarrassment.]

Tom: (whispering) This is unreal. Mark is completely under her control!

Lisa: (giggling) I guess Sarah was right, even in her drunken state. Poor Mark, he'll be mortified once he snaps out of it.

[As the party continues and people revel, Mark remains in his trance, unaware of the spectacle he has become.]

End of scene.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, implanting a ‘sleep and obey’ trigger, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare slipped her feet out of her strappy sandals.

Her toes were aching and she wanted to relax them for a bit. David noticed her slip them off and teased her, “Hey, don’t get too comfortable now. We’ve still got a long night ahead of us.”

Clare rolled her eyes at him and responded, “Oh, don’t be such a party pooper, David. You need to loosen up a bit.”

David laughed, “Loosen up? Have you met me? I’m the king of loosening up. Watch this.” He picked up his pint glass and downed it in one go, slamming it back on the table with a satisfied “Ahh.”

The rest of the team cheered and ordered another round. As they waited for their drinks, Clare turned to David and said, “Hey, have you ever tried hypnosis?”

David raised his eyebrows in surprise. “Hypnosis? You mean like making people cluck like a chicken or something?”

Clare nodded. “Yeah, that kind of thing. Apparently, it’s supposed to be really relaxing and calming.”

David scoffed, “I don’t think that stuff is real. It’s just a bunch of mumbo jumbo.”

Clare smiled mischievously. “Well, we could always give it a try. I promise I won’t make you do anything embarrassing.”

David shrugged. “Sure, why not. Let’s give it a shot.”

Clare grinned and motioned for him to close his eyes. She started to speak in a soft, soothing voice, instructing him to relax and focus on his breathing. David felt himself sinking into a deep state of relaxation, his muscles becoming loose and limp.

Clare continued to speak in a calm voice, implanting suggestions in his mind that would make him more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, and also implanting a ‘sleep and obey’ trigger, which would activate whenever she said the phrase ‘sleep and obey’.

Finally, she asked him to open his eyes and he obediently complied. He felt incredibly relaxed and refreshed. Clare asked him how he felt, and he replied, “Amazing. I never realized how tense I was until now.”

The rest of the night went on with lots of laughter and fun. David had completely forgotten about the hypnosis session, thinking it was just a silly party trick. However, the next day when he saw Clare at work, he couldn’t help but feel a strange sense of ease whenever she spoke to him. She noticed he was acting a bit differently towards her, and felt a thrill of excitement when she realized that her hypnosis had been successful.

A few days later, they were at another office party and Clare whispered the trigger phrase, ‘sleep and obey’ into David’s ear, causing him to slip into a hypnotic state once again. She took full advantage of his suggestibility and made him do some embarrassing and humiliating acts in front of their colleagues, all the while knowing that he would have no memory of it afterwards. Clare felt both powerful and aroused by her newfound ability to manipulate David at will, and couldn’t wait to see what other tricks she could teach him in the future.
write a script for what happened at the second party after she triggered him

INT. OFFICE PARTY - NIGHT

The second office party is in full swing. David is mingling with his colleagues while holding a drink in his hand. Clare approaches him with a sly smile on her face.

Clare: Hey David, how you feeling?

David: (smiling) Great, Clare. Thanks for asking.

Clare leans in towards David and whispers the trigger phrase “Sleep and obey” into his ear.

David's eyes glaze over and he immediately falls into a deep hypnotic state.

Clare: (grinning) Perfect.

Clare starts to give him commands.

Clare: David, I want you to do something for me. I want you to go up to Mark and start acting like a chicken.

David: (obediently) Okay.

David walks up to Mark and starts to flap his arms like a chicken. Everyone at the party notices and starts to laugh.

Clare: David, stop. I want you to go over to Karen and start doing jumping jacks.

David stops flapping his arms and walks over to Karen, who is talking with some coworkers. He starts doing jumping jacks in front of her.

Karen: (giggling) David, what are you doing?

David: (obediently) I'm doing jumping jacks because Clare told me to.

Karen: Clare? What's going on?

Clare: (walking up) Nothing, Karen. David is just having some fun.

Karen looks at Clare with suspicion but doesn't say anything.

Clare: David, come with me for a second.

David follows Clare to a quiet corner of the party.

Clare: (smiling) David, snap out of it.

David blinks and looks around, confused.

David: What just happened?

Clare: (smiling) You were hypnotized, David. And you did everything I told you to do.

David: (shocked) What? But I don't remember any of it.

Clare: That's how hypnosis works, David. You were in a deep trance and didn't remember anything afterwards.

David: (dazed) Wow, that's amazing.

Clare: Yes, it is. And I have a feeling you're going to be a great subject for future sessions.

David: (smiling) I'm excited to see what you can do, Clare.

Clare: (smiling wickedly) You should be.

Clare walks away, feeling both powerful and aroused by her newfound ability to control David. David is left standing there, wondering what he has gotten himself into.
